name: L'atique by agelandkaai(.be)
description:
Hello, and welcome to L'atique by Agelandkaai(.be)
Here on airbnb and online on the web you will find all the info you need to contact us. May be interesting for you to contact us there first.
Search once on the web.
Occupancy taxes and fees is sadly a new tax of 6% imposed by our government, the rest is the Tourist Tax off 3€ a night, for each guest.

The space
Well situated and quiet apartment, with shared terrace & air conditioning, just 200m across Gent-Dampoort railway station, Flixbus and Eurolines, and possible free parking on the station's parking lot.

Gent-Dampoort is the railway station closest to the city hall, (1km) and has direct trains to Antwerp, Bruges, Kortrijk, Lille Flanders (France), Ypres, and the coastal cities Ostend and De Panne. Weekdays direct train to Brussels at 07h47… Very easy for city trips to these cities.

Gay friendly.

L'atique by Agelandkaai is our second project in the house, it's
host_about:
Hello, we are Jurgen & Tom
History teacher/certified guide and train manager.
Happy to have you stay with us in our house, we hope it makes you, as many others, feel at home.

When looking for dates to book, might be a good idea to look up agelandkaai online, (our landcode is be), and have a look there, you'll find special offers on restaurants, the parking policy and other extra's, like our walking tours through Gent, and what we offer on food and drinks.

You might notice that we are not available on saturdays for checking in or out. That way we keep our saturdays somewhat to ourselves (cleaning wise). Or to have time for our experience, a historic walking tour through Gent, with Jurgen as your guide.

However if you're staying for four or more days, you can always inquire to arrive or leave on a saturday. Mostly won't be a problem. You have a no, but you might get a yes…

name: Minimalistic House Near Ghent
description:
Welcome to our little house in the suburbs of Ghent! We are expats who divide their time between two lovely cities: Uppsala (Sweden) and Ghent. When we are away, we decided to share our house with other travelers, who can enjoy a restful stay in the quiet suburbs and combine it with visiting the beautiful city of Ghent.

The space
The house has a spacious living room with dining table and a seating area. There are two bedrooms, each of them has a double bed. The bathroom has a bathtub and a shower. Of course, we also have a washing machine, as we know that traveling with kids sometimes involves a lot of laundry. Because we are a family with small kids, we have almost everything for little ones. There are toys, books (mostly in Dutch and Swedish), a baby chair, toddler bed and baby cot

Other things to note
The garden is a great area to play in, but because we are often away, it sometimes can look a bit like a jungle. Feel free to roam around,
neighborhood_overview: Within walking distance from our house, you can find a supermarket (Carrefour), a bakery and a butcher. If you like to be outdoors, we can recommend the nature park “Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen”, which is only 1,5 km away and is nice green spot to relax. If you are by bike, it only takes about 15 minutes to go to the city center, there are lots of cycling routes to choose from. Or you can go to the nearest bus stop (100m) or the tram stop (1,2 km)

name: Maison Etienne, luxurious short stay near Ghent
description:
Maison Etienne
A brand new, fully furnished, well situated, cosy and trendy loft for at least 5 people with a garden.

It is perfect for family, friends, couples and business travellers who want to visit Ghent and Sint-Martens-Latem, known for its rich art tradition. There are excellent restaurants nearby.

This luxurious, ground level apartment (part of HUIS19) is adaptable to your needs.
Therefore it’s also for rent for meetings, product presentations, workshops, etc

The space
Large living space with
-fully installed kitchen with all equipment (oven, dishwasher, microwave, nespresso,...)
-free wifi, cable TV, sonos,...
-one very comfortable sofa bed for 1 adult or 2 kids (110cm wide)
1 bathrooms with large walk-in shower
1 private toilet
2 independent bedrooms with real beds:
-one bedroom with queen size bed, with optional baby cot;
-one bedroom with 2 bunk beds.
In the basement:
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is very close to the river Leie where you can take the manually operated ferry to cross it. From that point you can walk endlessly into the nature.
You have lots of very nice biking routes in all kind of categories.
We can arrange a boat or kayaks (both optional) to get to Ghent using the river Leie (in summer only).

The apartment is situated just outside Ghent and just next to the world famous Sint-Martens-Latem, known for its rich art tradition that characterises the East Flanders Lys Valley. There are excellent restaurants within short distance.

Public transportation trams, shops, restaurants and bars are literally around the corner. The very heart of the city center is at a 5 to 10 minutes walking distance. There will be a shelf reserved for you in the fridge. The bathroom has a bath and shower. Shampoo, shower gells and clean towels are at your disposal. S

name: NEW: Book a luxury stay, enjoy the Ghent city life
description:
Looking for a unique place to stay in Ghent? Choose our place for contempory living in a completely refurbished authentic townhouse that dates back to the beginning of the 20th century.

Discover and enjoy the Ghent city life at walking distance.

Right across the city park 'Groene Vallei' (green valley), ideal for picknicks and only a breath away from 'Blaarmeersen' sports and recreation park.

Fresh linen and nespresso? We offer all the modern amenities that make you feel right at home.

The space
Our place has a master bedroom with ensuite bathroom (sleeps 2 - baby cot possible at request), and a large duplex room (sleeps 3) with ensuite shower and mezzanine. We have a normal sized extra bed for a child at your disposal should you need this. We have to say that the stairs in the duplexsuite are steep, as you can see in the pictures. The bedrooms are fitted with new quality beds.

The living room has an eco-leather sofa
neighborhood_overview:
You are in walking distance to the city center.

Ghent's best restaurants are around the corner (check out Volta, Oak and Door 73, just a few steps away) and there is a large grocery store for all your supplies across the street.

Our place is located right across the city park Groene Vallei (green valley), ideal for picknicks and close to Blaarmeersen sports and recreation park, a green jewel beside the Watersportbaan in Ghent. This is where Ghent residents come jogging, and rowing clubs battle it out on the water. It is a lovely area for walking, with a vast lake. You can swim, hire a pedalo, or go kayaking, surfing, fishing and diving. A large sandy beach for everyone makes the Blaarmeersen in Ghent complete. If you’re looking for sporting activities in Ghent, this is the place to be!
Ghent is a small city where everything is concentrated within a couple of square kilometers, so all of the museums and historic buildings are nearby. Ghent has an ideal positio

name: Private Bed- & Bathroom in cozy city house
description:
We have been living in Ghent for many years now and we love it.
Our neighbourhood is nice and quiet, at a very short walk from interesting musea, beautiful parks, good restaurants & bars, and a big movie theatre.
It is located at walking distance from the historic city centre, perfectly located and well-connected with all types of (public) transport.

We will give you any suggestions according to your preferences to make your stay an unforgettable one!
Come and visit our beautiful city Ghent!

The space

The private bathroom (with shower, toilet and sink) is located next to your bedroom.

name: Unique Cabin right at the river called 'Leie'
description:
The Leiecabin is located on a unique piece of land on the Leie in St-Martens-Leerne, a stone's throw from Ghent and even closer to St-Martens-Latem and Deurle, the most picturesque villages in East Flanders! The Cabin has a private sauna and hottub on firewood. We can provide boat trip with skipper or book an electric boat (no license needed) to discover the Leie.

Other things to note
Please note we also rent out a YACHT, on the ponton next door, these guest sometimes pass by to get on the boat, but not in your immediate privacy.
host_about: Leiecabin is a very nice Pipo Wagon with one room, bathroom and kitchenette. We are a stone drop away from Sint-Martens-Latem, one of the most pittoresque villages in East Flanders. The cabin has a sauna and hottub free to use! We also have an additional glamping tent for the kids to sleep or for a befriended couple!

name: Spacy Room Old Townhouse Cool Vibe Late Check-out!
description: The owner is a comedian who lives already 3 decades in town. Tips on food, drink and party are true. Maps and guides for free. A lot of parking space around(fees only 6 € for 24h). 15 min. walking from city centre, station(Dampoort) and Club KOMPASS. Public transport around the corner. Free expresso in the morning. Smoking-garden. Several good cheap restaurants, new hot spot beach, supermarket and nightshops : all very close. Not a spotless hotel bathroom but hey: everything works!
neighborhood_overview:
Definitely more and more becoming the new hot spot in town. Lots of parking space. Fifteen minutes walking to the centre of the city centre, the second railwaystation(Dampoort) and the famous danceclub "KOMPASS". Interesting local bars and good (cheaper) restaurants. Very near to the old port where there is a popular town beach(swimming is not allowed but everybody does).
Public transport just around the corner can bring you to every site worthwhile.
Best (real)cocktail sundowner pub within few hundred meters. Supermarket, specialist beershop (with about all belgian beer specials) and coffeebrunchbars within 100 meters. Lots of nightshops. Nearly all cityfestivals in walking distance. Bike-rental possible.

description:
- Newly renovated apartment with a stylish Scandinavian design and a cosy feel
- Excellent location in the city center (Next to Gravensteen). Everything within walking distance.
- Great public transport to train stations (Gent-Sint-Pieters & Gent-Dampoort) and business centers (Dok Noord, Flanders Expo, Gent Zuid...)

The space
You will be staying in a stylishly designed, Scandinavian inspired apartment with a cosy feel to it. It is the ideal place to explore the city with friends, family or colleagues!

- In the past year, the building has been completely renovated to the latest standards (incl. state-of-the art fire safety).
- A high chair and baby cot can be provided upon request
- Fresh bed linen and towels are provided

Guest access
You will have the entire loft to yourself, including a priva
neighborhood_overview:
Experience Ghent from it's beautiful historic center! Located right next to the Castle Of The Counts (aka Het Gravensteen), all the city's treasures are within walking distance:
- Veldstraat and Korenmarkt for shopping
- Korenmarkt and Vlasmarkt for going out
- Patershol and Graslei for restaurants and outside terrasses
- Lievekaai and Prinsenhof for a romantic walk
- A lot of museums (Design Museum, Huis Van Alijn, Kunsthal Gent), medieval churches, cathedrals, belfry... around the corner

All the while you are in a quiet neighbourhood without much street noise. You'll be hard-pressed to find a better location to explore the city from!

name: Deluxe Double/Twin Room in the city centre
description:
Cosy room for 1 or 2 guests, hidden in a quiet and narrow street in the heart of the city centre. The room has a DOUBLE BED, but can be prepared with TWIN BEDS upon request (before 12:00 pm on check-in day). The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a shower, bath towels, shampoo and a hairdryer. Stunning view of St. Bavo's Cathedral. Suitable for couples or friends. You can also enjoy a buffet breakfast for only 12 € per person per day to pay at the reception, just let us know in advance.

The space
Our hotel is a little home right in the heart of the city. We have recently renovated the common areas downstairs based on our project for a "New Flandria Hotel", more connected to the city of Ghent. In our bar you can meet Betty Bijoux, a lady from the 20's who will be happy to serve you some good Belgian beers or strong Italian coffee : ) In our breakfastroom you can also enjoy a buffet breakfast for only 12 € per person per day to pay at the reception.

G
neighborhood_overview: Our hotel is located in the heart of Ghent, a few steps away from St. Bavo's Cathedral, the Castle of Counts and other important attractions of the city. It is hidden in a little street surrounded by canals where you can admire the beautiful lights of the city. Thanks to its special position, you will be able to enjoy the most vibrant spots of the city, knowing you have a calm and cosy room waiting for you at walking distance.
host_about:
With only 22 rooms, our hotel feels like a home, a cosy place where you can find us: local, multilingual people, ready to welcome and help you. We are just 10 people here; a small family that’s happy to make you feel at home and to show you the best our city has to offer. Apart from the homely atmosphere, there are other reasons to stay at our place: 

PERFECT LOCATION – our hotel is hidden in a narrow and calm street, where you can sleep peacefully and dream the sweetest dreams. At the same time, we are close to the vibrant spots of the city where you can experience the best Belgian beer and the best city views.

BEST COFFEE IN TOWN – if you are a coffeeholic, our hotel is the place to be! In our bar you can drink a real Italian espresso and cappuccino, or try different specialities with coffee as the main ingredient. Our coffee provider (Caffè Pedron) is 100 % Italian – and nobody does coffee like the Italians do!

name: sunny townhouse in Gent
description:
Perfectly situated and recently renovated spacious townhouse in a quiet neighborhood at 15 min walk from Gent St-Pieters train station and 15 min walk from the historic city center. A direct tram connection gets you there even faster. There are two bikes available for you to explore the city.

The space
You have a separate bedroom on your own floor, with private toilet and bathroom with bathtub, rain-shower and sink. Showergel, shampoo and hairdryer are provided. The king size bed with Emma quality matras will provide for a relaxing sleep. Towels and bedlinen are provided.

Guest access
We will share the ground level: open dining area/breakfast bar/kitchen/living room and you have the possibility to use a modern, fully equipped kitchen. You also have access to the sunny rooftop terrace on the first floor, or if that gets too hot, the cosy city garden at ground level next to the living room always keeps it cool.

Other things to n
neighborhood_overview: The place is on the edge of the inner city, a 10 to 15 min walk to the historic city center. You will find several cosy café's en route to the city center. Nature reserve Bourgoyen is also close by, just outside of town. Several supermarkets, a bakery, and Ghent's most renowned 'frietkot' are all within 200 meters.
host_about: I like adventure traveling, mountain hiking, biking and road trips. I work as researcher in biological sciences, and a few years ago I finished Art Academy photography on the side. I am spontaneous and optimistic, and like getting to meet new people. I am happy to share my modern but cosy house with visitors looking to explore the wonderful and lively city of Ghent.

name: Casa Gante 9000 with garden and covered terrace!
description:
Beautiful renovated apartment with spectacular garden and covered terrace. Located in the arts neighbourhood of Ghent. Parks, shops bars and restaurants at walking distance

The space
You have the whole ground floor at your disposal with separate shower, toilet and kitchen, a glass door gives you acces to a spacious covered terrace and garden.

Guest access
The house is a spacious bell-etage house. You will stay in the renovated ground floor and we live upstairs. The ground floor has a bedroom and living room separated by a glass door. Further down the hall there is a toilet, shower, kitchen and acces to the terrace and garden. The basement can be used for clothes cleaning and drying. Everything upstairs is off limits to guests!

Other things to note
The house is a typical Belgian bell- etage, so you have the ground floor to yourself and we live upstairs. We only share entrance and garden.
neighborhood_overview: Very nice neighborhood in the arts center of the city. Everything within walking distance. Bakkery, grocery, restaurants, bars within 1k. Also a splendid view from the garden on the city skyline.
host_about:
Hey, I've been living in Ghent for over 15 years. Ghent is the ideal mix between Brussels, Antwerp and Bruges. But most important Ghent is by far the most fun of all Belgian cities. It has a unique, lefty, young and dynamic atmosphere. With lots of nice restaurants and bars to go out and to have contact with the locals, because people in Ghent are multilingual and have a broad view on the world and his inhabitants!

As flight attendants  we’ve been travelling all over the world and had to stay in hotels. Hotel rooms are practically all the same and so I find it more enjoyable to stay in houses of local people. In addition you get more insight information wich I value.

My house is situated in the arts neighborhood and very close to the trainstation and the main highways entering the city.

Hallo, ik woon al 20 jaar in de mooiste maar vooral leukste stad van België. Ons huis staat in het centrum van de kunstenbuurt en is voorzien van alle comfort.

Wij reizen voor ons werk de hele wereld af en moeten noodgedwongen in hotels overnachten. Dat is vaak heel eentonig en saai. Daarom vinden wij reizen en slapen bij mensen thuis een mooi alternatief.

name: Deluxe Suite
description:
Soak up the atmosphere of the 1879 build house by the family de Werchin. its family tree goes back to 1100 ac. We have tried to give it it's old glory back and send you back in time. Enjoy our enormous mid city garden or the old city center on sunny days. We are situated on the 'Art-Mile' of Ghent where you have on walking distance of 5 Musea

The space
the space is filled with original modern art items from 1950 to 1970. blended with original 1900 tile's and decoration

Guest access
guest can use our garden and dinning area but also have their private dining area. parking space is a ailable or a garage to place a bike.
neighborhood_overview: park and museum area of the city. a movie theater and swimming pool on 500m walking distance
host_about:
Een gezin die het avontuur van zijn leven begon in een historisch pand te Gent.  Je kan ons vinden op de kunstenkilometer van Gent: het SMAK, MSK en de Bijlokesite (met o.a. KASK en STAM) liggen allemaal op dezelfde as. Het gebouw is een deel van de historie, met een architectuur en geschiedenis die we in zijn waarde laten.

Ons pand is gebouwd in opdracht van Laurent de Werchin. Van de gekende de Werchin familie waarvan de stamboom te vinden is tot 1100NC. De bekendste daarvan was Baron Pierre de Werchin.h Ridder aan het hof van Keizer Karel. Zijn wapenschild is de bezichtigen in de st baafskathedraal.

 Naast onze eigen tuin kunnen gasten genieten van twee parken binnen 500m. Het muinkpark en het Citadelpark.

description:
Your room is bright, cosy and in the attic of my recently renovated house.
it is perfect for a young couple, for solo travelers or business people.
In the room you will find a comfortable bed, fresh linnen, fresh towels, a cupboard with drawers and you will also find plants.
The shared bathroom is one level below (first floor), it provides hot water, a walk-in rain shower, a toilet, 2 sinks (the one on the right hand side is mine),
more fresh towels if needed and all kinds of soap and shampoo.

The space
My house is located at less than 5 km from the city of Ghent, at a ridiculous walking distance from a bus stop (a bus which takes you to the historical centre in no time) and at 650 meters from the Merelbeke train station,
where you can jump on the train to go to Ghent Sint Pieters station (3 minutes), Brussels, Zaventem international airport and elsewhere in this amazing country.
If you are a guest in my house, you can use the ki
host_about:
Sociable, outgoing, welcoming and devoted.
I thrive when surrounded by genuine people, sitting together around a table filled with plenty of food and drinks, sharing experiences and life stories. My fridge is always full and the wine is always cold. I enjoy spending time at my place because there are books, wifi and an open door for welcoming friends and guests. My house in a row is a warm, open and green spot very close to Ghent.

name: Luxurious sunny apartment, ideal for expats!
description:
Our new sunny apartment is very bright thanks to the huge sliding windows that cover the entire south side of the apartment. The kitchen-living and dining space is all one big space giving it a lofty feel. In the summer you can open the sliding windows which gives the whole apartment an outdoorsy feel. The two bedrooms have access to a large terrace with delightful morning sun. One bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and toilet, the other bedroom is provided with a desk, ideal for working from home

The space
The apartment is on the third floor, it was recently constructed and is very comfortable. Its a very quiet and peaceful space with plenty of sunlight.
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet residential neighbourhood with shops nearby. Walking distance from the city centre and plenty of parking space in our street.
host_about: I'm a mother to 2 boys. My husband, my boys and I all live on this address in Gent. We have recently started hosting here on Airbnb, with some success. We always try to make our guests feel completely at home. We hope you will enjoy your stay as much as our previous guests!

name: Under the weeping willow
description:
Sleeping under the weeping willow tree means close to every site in ghent and easy access to tram, bus, train, highways while sleeping in a quiet environment.
Under the willow tree means as well a house originated from before 1860 which still maintains the looks and feel of before.

The space
The house Under The Weeping wilow dates back from before official registration started at 1860 and hence welcomed many persons since then. These days of course it has been updated a bit so yes we have a shower and indoor toilet. The room is up to date and you have free parking onsite.

Guest access
Next to access to your room, the bathroom, the toilet and the garden you may use the kitchen or living room and the washing room from time to time if we respect a bit off privacy no problem:-)

name: Modern and comfortable apartment
description:
Enjoy sitting in the morning sun on the terrace overlooking a quiet city park.
Go for a nice walk or run via a pleasant foot path along the Scheldt to the beautiful Liedemeerspark or the impressive (240 Ha!) nature domain the Gentbrugse Meersen.
Visit the beautiful historic center or the many must-see cities around Ghent, such as Bruges, Antwerp and Brussels via easily accessible highways and public transport.

The space
The apartment has an equipped open kitchen, storage room, bathroom with shower, separate toilet, a bedroom with a large double bed, desk room and a terrace overlooking a quiet city park.
There is an underground parking space available and a covered bicycle storage area next to the building.
The neighbors are very quiet and friendly.

name: Modern apartment close to Flanders Expo
description:
Modern and stylish apartment on the outskirts of the lovely city Gent.

In walking distance to the ‘Flandes Expo’ event center and close to the train station Gent Sint-Pieters (+/- 1.5 km). It will take you about 10-15 min to reach the city center by bike or car.

Free underground secured parking.

You have immediate access to the highways E40 (Brussels - Belgian coastline) and E17 (Antwerp/Netherlands - France).

There is a tram stop at the Flanders Expo that goes straight to the city center.

The space
Extra: free parking, netflix, city information (inside tips)
neighborhood_overview: The recreational (sport)park ‘de Blaarmeersen’ is just around the corner. More information on activities and getting around upon request!
host_about:
Hi! 

I am Koen, pronounced as in ha-koen-a matata or Koen-Fu :). Friends also call me a lot by my middle name: Roger!

Enjoying life to the fullest and truly happy when enjoying a nice drink in the presence of good company, preferably in an exciting location. When I am traveling, I try to get to know the city at an easy pace without going through a busy program. 

My apartment is located in the outskirts of the lovely city Gent, close to the train station and the 'Flanders Expo' event center. Also, the recreational (sport)park ‘de Blaarmeersen’ is just around the corner. By bike or car it takes 10-15 min to the city center (yes, it's the same!). 
If you travel by car, you have immediate access to the highways E40 (Brussels - Belgian coastline) and E17 (Antwerp/Netherlands - France).

Looking forward to meet you.
Koen (Roger)

neighborhood_overview:
This apartment is really located in the historic city center of Ghent. Parking space is nearby in the 'Vrijdagsmarkt' parking lot. (This apartment is located just within the car-free zone) In a few minutes you are in the shopping streets of the city center and you can stroll along the water. Numerous restaurants, bakers and other specialty shops are located nearby.

Dit appartement ligt echt in het historische stadscentrum van Gent. Parkeerruimte is vlakbij in de parking van de 'Vrijdagsmarkt'. (Dit appartement bevindt zich net binnen de autovrije zone) Op enkele minuten staat u in de winkelstraten van de binnenstad en kan u kuieren langs het water. Tal van restaurants, bakkers en andere speciaalzaken bevinden zich vlakbij.

name: Big and beautiful house at Citadelpark
description:
Our spacious house is located conveniently close to the central train station (Gent-Sint-Pieters) and alongside Ghent's Citadel park. The art museums are a very short stroll through the park and the city centre is easily reachable from our very peaceful neighbourhood.

The space
A big living area with dining table and fully equipped kitchen is to be found on our ground floor, on sunny days we invite you to have a drink on the terrace in our garden. Three big bedrooms and two bathrooms await you once you climb the stairs to the other floors.

We provide you with everything you need to have a great stay, but please note that there is no television in the house. You'll have soft towels and quality bedding. We provide you with coffee. If you want to cook, there's basic spices and oil available for you.

We use organic products as much as possible (soap, shampoo, cleaning products, etc.).

neighborhood_overview: The citadel park, which is right at the house, provides a great place to start your mornings with a run or walk.  The art galeries and an exhibition centre are located in the park.  Our street is one-way, and very calm thanks to the 30km/h speed limit.
host_about: Angela and Boudewijn are retired “empty nesters” and enjoy traveling immensely.  When traveling ourselves, we very much like to stay in a real home, rather than a hotel.  Apart from the experience of ‘living like a local’, we enjoy the privacy of being in a home, especially when we travel with friends & family.  We warmly welcome you to our home in Gent!

The place consists of a 30m2 living room & kitchen. The mezzanine has a double bed which can be used as chillout or for sleeping. The second part is 10m2 room with double bed & shower, perfect for people with children :) Aside a half-open patio, you 'll also enjoy the sunset from the upperdek :)

The space
The front of the boat is a bedroom with double bed, following the shape of the boat. Sleeping there will wake you up with the sound and view of the water :)

Here you will also find toilet, sink and glass rainshower.

Next to that is the main area, combining kitchen, livingroom and bed/chillout on the mezzanine. There you will find a pelletstove, a tikibar with barstools and cozy rotan sofa’s

Studio op wandelafstand van het centrum op de bovenste etage (2de) van een herenhuis in een rustige laan met weinig verkeer en veel bomen.

neighborhood_overview:
Ideaal qua bereikbaarheid met de auto (afslag Gent-Antwerpen E17), de trein (station Gent Dampoort & dan 12' het fiets-en wandelpad volgen) of de bus.
Te voet op 20' van het centrum. Aan de ene kant, 'Zuid', waar 'de Krook' domineert. Deze gloednieuwe bibliotheek vlakbij de universiteit is het recentste staaltje moderne architectuur. In deze buurt kan je heerlijk ontbijten, brunchen en shoppen. Ook op amper 20' wandelafstand, in de andere richting, 'Portus Ganda'. Deze jachthaven met de 'Gentse Lorelei' bevindt zich net naast de Sint-Baafsabdij, 1 van de meest poëtische historische sites van Gent. Hier geen gebrek aan gezellige terrasjes, betaalbare restaurants en hippe cafés.
Een half uurtje wandelen van de Gentse universiteit site Sint-Pietersnieuwstraat/Blandijn.
Op 20' van een zwembadcomplex en een kwartiertje van een 240 ha groot natuurreservaat langs de Schelde met een fiets- en wandelpad. Ideaal voor joggers of om te bekomen na dat nachtje stappen...

description:
Large and modern apartment near Ghent. Located near the Parkbos which is beautiful for long walks. You’re at the beginning of the ‘Vlaamse Ardennen’ which is perfect for bike rides.
You would be staying at the crossroad between all the major Belgian cities such as Antwerp, Brussels, Ostend, Bruges and of course Ghent.
All three bedrooms have the possibility to convert the single beds to a double bed with the use of topper mattresses.
The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need.

The space
The apartment offers three large bedrooms, all with 2 single beds that can be converted to a double bed with the use of a top mattress. Baby beds are available upon request.

The bedroom on the first floor has an en-suite bathroom with a walk in shower and bath. The bathroom on the second floor is located in between the other two bedrooms and has a walk in shower. Both bathrooms have double sinks.

There is a private toilet on th
neighborhood_overview:
We’re located in the beautiful Zevergem which is a 7 min drive from Ghent South. The bus stops right around the corner to bring you to Ghent central station in about 25 minutes. We have several good restaurants nearby and different grocery stores as well

At only 2km from the apartment there’s a bike rental shop if you would like to hire some bikes to enjoy the beautiful environment.

There’s a private garage to park your bikes available if needed. If you like to bring your own bike that is possible as well.

At the ‘parkbos’ you have several running tracks available if you want to go out for a run.

It's a cosy place!

name: Master Bedroom in Ghent (8 min. from center)
description:
Welcome to our house near the waterside in Ghent. We are situated in a quiet area with easy access to the city center and the train stations (tram stop is 1 minute away).

We offer towels, soap, and laundry service. In our kitchen you'll find coffee, tea, cooking herbs, olive oil, pots and pans, utensils. All are free to use.

This is a family-owned house with 2 Airbnb rooms.

The space
Ground Floor: living room, kitchen, toilet, and bathroom.
First Floor: we have 2 x Airbnb rooms available.
Second Floor: we have reserved the second floor as a private space.

This master bedroom has a private toilet and sink attached.

Guest access
All the common spaces and your own private room.

This entire city area has been renovated by the city government to include a new shopping center, housing projects, public schools, cultural venues, etc. Our street has just been renovated. The wobbly and narrow pavement has been replaced by a broad and flat one, and we all have a small facade garden now. Also the tramway and the parking spaces are brand-new.

name: Bright room in Art-deco House, Top location
description:
Bright spacious room in a newly renovated art deco house from the early 40's. Located in the heart of Ghent. You have a private kitchen + bathroom (shared w/ the 1 other airbnb-room) and we provide a set table so you've got a 'private restaurant' feeling. There's a lot of great take-aways in our street (such as Shazanna, Edgar Kaasbar, Golden Gai, Mission Massala, Baravins, ... We also have a cat called Dennis, who will give you the warmest welcome!

The space
The 3rd floor is only for our Airbnb-guests. We have 2 airbnb-rooms with a shared bathroom & kitchen.
neighborhood_overview: Our house is situated on a top location in Ghent: very central and easy accessible. All the restaurants, cafés etc are just around the corner (just like the famous Charlatan or St. Jacobs-church).
host_about: We're Clara & Agnör, a young couple from Belgium, Ghent. Agnör is working as a manager at the Airport, and Clara is working in photography & marketing. We both love traveling, electronic music, food, meeting new people and our cat Dennis.

name: Loft attic with roof terrace and small pool
description:
A quiet and beautiful loft with private roof terrace and a small pool, within walking distance of nature and city center

The space
The loft is located on the attic floor of the house. Only the entrance and stairs to the first floor are shared with the owners of the house. This is followed by an outside staircase that arrives at the roof terrace that leads to the loft door.
The loft covers 95m2 and consists of a small hall with access to the bathroom (toilet and rain shower) and the large living room.

Guest access
Design
The large room contains a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen island (a small freezer is in the hall), a living room, a desk, a double and a single bed. The double bed and the washbasin can be separated with a curtain. The single bed also has privacy by means of a folding screen.

The room has a lot of windows. 6 skylights let in the morning light. Underneath there are 4 small wall windows. At the dinin
neighborhood_overview: The Loft is located in a quiet area, there is no through traffic. Stores close-by. You can walk to the Keizerspark with its giant plane trees in 5 minutes. The street leads onto the Scheldepad to the Gentbrugse Meersen. In 7 minutes you cycle along the water to the city center.

name: Artist Loft
description:
Set in a townhouse in the heart of historical Ghent, a 10-minute walk from the Belfry, St Bavo’s Cathedral and Gravensteen’s castle, you can find the Artist’s Loft. Located in an old ‘cité’ recently renovated by Monument services, and decorated with original works of art, this loft offers painting and drawing facilities as well as free WiFi. It features two levels with a seating area on each, and coffee and tea facilities, micro-wave and minibar on the top level.

The space
The loft comes with a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer, free toiletries and bathrobes. For breakfast, lunch or dinner guests can visit one of the many establishments in the immediate surroundings.

name: M/S Carpe-Diem "Cargo Hold" - Loft on a Barge
description:
M/S Carpe-Diem, "Seize-the-Day", is a barge built in 1951. The ship is moored in the old docklands of Ghent and has been transformed into an exceptional, eco-friendly home.
The ship's cargo hold has been renovated into a contemporary, loft-like residence of 65 square meter, with all modern comfort, including a heated outdoor pool with jet stream.
The cargo hold accommodates maximum 4 people, with two separate bedrooms with double beds.  Ideal for tourists and expatriate professionals.

The space
The ship, with registration n° 0600465, was purchased from a retired skippers couple in 2014.  The vessel had always been used to transport goods (e.g., wheat, steel rolls, etc.).  The ship measures 39,10 meter long by 5,05 meters wide.  It is powered by a still functional 268 kW Cummins Marine diesel engine.
​
The renovations started in 2015, based on a novel concept whereby the cargo hold remained intact and the main residence - consisting of conta
host_about:
Hello, I am Filip, father of two beautiful daughters and husband of an exceptional wife.

A few years ago we bought an old ship - actually in a flash of absolute lack of sense of reality.  In the meantime, we have renovated the ship and transformed it into a modern home.  Feel free to view the photos, the ship is the ideal base camp for exploring the city of Ghent and Flanders.

Travel safely ... and maybe see you soon, in Ghent.

Filip & C°

name: Stay aboard our 1914 Dutch Klipperaak
description:
We very much regret that due to the ongoing Coronavirus pandemic bookings are limited to guests who have been double vaccinated and have their official COVid19 Safe Certificate.

SUMMER BOOKINGS:
Our barge is moored in Gent from 1st October through to 31st March. From 1st April to 30th September we are travelling with the barge and bookings are limited during this time. Please contact us to enquire about availability.

The space
You are warmly welcomed aboard our beautiful 1914 Dutch Klipperaak barge. Check in is between 1500 - 2100hrs. We hope you will be very comfortable here with us. Our guest suite is dedicated to you for the duration of your stay and it is priced on a per night basis for up to two people. No discounts or single occupancy rate is offered. All bed linens, towels and basic toiletries are provided for our guests comfort and use during their stay onboard with us. Our minimum stay is 2 nights (longer by arrangement). Breakfa
neighborhood_overview:
Our mooring is in the city and you are minutes away on foot from a plethora of shops, cafes, bars and many other visitor sites and attractions. We are happy to recommend various eateries based on our personal dining experience, so please do ask.
Parking: we do not have dedicated parking onsite, nor are we permitted a 'residents parking permit' as we do not own a car. However, there are various public parking options nearby. Some street parking is available on a first come first served basis and time limits will apply for the gratis (free) and paid (via street meter) spaces that are available. Ghent operates a park and ride system in addition to the many larger public carparks dotted around the area. All the information you might need regarding parking in the city is readily available on the internet for you to consider before making your booking.

name: Karaktervol huisje bij Sint-Baafs.
description:
Welkom in de historische omgeving van Sint-Baafs in Gent. In de schaduw van de kathedraal beschikken we over een gezellige gastenkamer, voor 1 of 2 personen in een oud en karaktervol huisje.
De privé badkamer ligt vlak naast de kamer.
De keuken en andere ruimtes deel je met de twee gastvrouwen, ze geven je graag tips en info over Gent.

Er woont ook een lieve kat in het huis. Ze heet Kitty.

The space
De roze kamer met antieke details heeft een queensize bed en bevind zich op het eerste verdiep.
De badkamer is gedeeld en beschikt over douche, wastafel en toilet.
neighborhood_overview: Je verblijft midden in het historische centrum van Gent. De Sint-Baafskathedraal met het wereldberoemde ‘Lam Gods’ ligt op een steenworp, op het gezellige Sint Baafsplein vind je vele restaurantjes en bars. Wat verder de winkelwandelstraten, de Korenmarkt en de Graslei.

name: Deluxe double room
description:
Je Kan ons vinden op de kunstenkilometer van Gent: het SMAK, MSK en de Bijlokesite (met o.a. KASK en STAM) liggen allemaal op dezelfde as. Het gebouw is een deel van de historie, met een architectuur en geschiedenis die we in zijn waarde laten.

Ons pand is gebouwd in opdracht van Laurent de Werchin. Van de gekende de Werchin. Een familie waarvan de stamboom te vinden is tot 1100NC. De bekendste daarvan Baron Pierre de Werchin Ridder aan het hof van Keizer Karel.

The space
Deze charmante kamer zit op het 2de verdiep en heeft een aangrenzende kamer. Origineel (1876) was dit één grote kamer met een deur in het midden zoals dat vroeger de gewoonte was. Deze deur hebben ze in de loop der jaren dicht gemetst. De ingangen van beide kamers zijn nu in de hall naast de ingang vannde badkamer.

beide kamers zijn ingericht als slaapkamer.

Guest access
garden

name: Shelter7
description:
Een heel stadswoning voor jullie alleen? Shelter7 is een moderne architecturale parel midden in het centrum van Gent. Een mix van brutalisme, minimalisme en Wabi Sabi.
De voorgevel bestaat uit een betonnen structuur, die de krijtlijn vormt van een oude afdruk. De vide brengt licht van buiten naar binnen. Een verrassende combinatie van 3 etages bestemd om elke gast tot rust te brengen. Oikofilie op zijn best.
Shelter7 is een B&E, een bed & experience, het biedt extra ervaringen op maat.

The space
Shelter7. Een inspirerende ruimte die Wabi Sabi uitademt en fungeert als rustpunt, een stilteoord binnen de bruisende stad. Een plek die je even naar een hoger niveau tilt en die jou en je gasten bijblijft, modern met een hoek af, een onafgewerkte cirkel van zenitude.
neighborhood_overview: Midden in het historisch stadscentrum, op 50 meter van het Belfort, op 100 meter van het stadshuis en stadshal, op 250 meter van de Graslei en op minder als 500 meter van het Gravensteen. Maar toch in een gezellig, rustiger straatje.
host_about:
A Guardian of the Wabi-Sabi art that I express into my lifestyle and the interior of Shelter 7 and Verne Dreams. Explore it during your stay and immerse yourself in my (hidden) personal artwork. 
I’m tend to be a content and positive person, always curious to meet new people and connect with new energies.

name: Studio Black Cat — Ghent downtown
description:
Cosy studio hidden behind Ghent's greenest facade. Fully furnished for a short break or long stay in the heart of Medieval Flanders.

The space
Our studio has a private entrance, its own bathroom, an equipped kitchen, a dining space and a sleeping area. It has windows on both sides of the house so there is ample light at any time of the day. Wooden floors all over, give the room a cosy touch.
The kitchen is fully furnished, has a small fridge, microwace, coffee machine and water kettle. We provide coffee & tea, and some herbs for your cooking comfort.
The bathroom comes with fresh towels, has a toilet, bath tub & shower and sink. Close to the bathroom there are plenty of closets to store your clothes.
The dining area seats three, and a comfy chair will give you a space to sit back and relax.
The bed (160cm width) comes with high quality Auping matresses, is covered with a down duvet and fresh bed linnen.

Guest access
The
neighborhood_overview:
Our studio is located in the city centre. As the city of Ghent is not a gigantic metropolis, all must sees are within walking distance. Public transport is just around the corner, and the connection to both of Ghent's train stations is excellent.
How about a morning stroll along the gorgeous 'Visserij', taking you straight into Portus Ganda? Or wander through the cobblestone squares and alleys along the towers of the city's historic heart?
Around the corner you'll find an artisanal bakery and a small supermarket providing you with everything to kickstart your day.
We have a few excellent restaurants - a bit off the beaten track - within 5 minutes walking distance: Elvire (€) serves the best burgers in town, Viva la Puglia (€€) does Italy at its best & De Fobie (€€) serves a traditional Belgian cuisine. Bar Bask (€€€) is an eclectic Basque style restaurant with pintxos to die for!

name: Uniek prachtig gelegen verblijf te Gent-centrum
description:
Prachtig gelegen verblijf te Gent-centrum in rustige, groene straat aan het water en het mooie en historische waardevolle Rabot en de Prinsenhofwijk.

The space

name: Private room in cosy home - quiet dead-end street
description:
Welcome to the amazing city of Gent and to your temporary home in the friendly multicultural neighbourhood Brugse Poort

✨ Your bedroom is located on the 2nd floor, where you have a comfortable bed, a chest of drawers, and a desk all to yourself ✨

Living room, kitchen and bathroom are shared but I work & travel a lot and have a busy life, so will probably be away often during your stay…

The space
This is my home, where I find peace and tranquillity. I put a lot of love and time into renovating my house and hope you will enjoy it as much as I do.

My house is in a dead end street, so it is very quiet. A little paradise close to the busy city ⭐️

Guest access
You have your own private bedroom. We will share the bathroom (if I’m not traveling).
You can use the kitchen.
The first floor is my private sanctuary

Other things to note
Please respect my neighbours’ rest (and mine) duri
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood Brugse Poort is up-and-coming, multicultural and with lots of young families. There are a few nice places to eat/drink, e.g. Café Congé, Ganzerik. You can find Turkish bakeries, grocery stores and laundry places within walking distance.

There is a big nature reserve close by, called Bourgoyen, where you can walk and observe lots of birds.
host_about: Freediver, foodie, traveler. Loves animals and nature.

name: Sweet romantic room in a big beautiful house ♥️
description:
welcome to our lovely home located in a beautiful and quiet neighborhood just out side Ghent, 10 min to city center by bike or bus.
Our house is 3 floor high and is full of light.
We offer a sweet and cozy room, super clean, romantic, with a small closet and a window to green and open sky view.
Big bathroom is just next to the room and also an open sitting area.
The living first floor is huge and we also have a lovely garden with a sitting area where ur welcome to join us on sunny days :)

The space
Quiet, sweet room with beautiful antique wooden mid size bed and a small closet located on the second floor of our big private house.
Just Next to the room you will find a beautiful spa designed bathroom with tush and toilet . There is also extra open space in this floor with sofa and sitting area.

Our kitchen is relatively small but you will find everything you need for basic cooking and I’m always there to assist.

I

Quartier Leonard II - Michelangelo Suite is located in the Binnenstad district of Ghent, 700 metres from Ghent Christmas Market, 600 metres from Graffiti Street and 600 metres from Ghent City Hall. This apartment is 2 km from Great Butchers' Hall and 1 km from Castle of Gerald the Devil.

name: Urban Loft | A unique spot to start your discovery
description:
Welcome at Urban Loft. Together with my husband Joachim we created this place situated in 'Machariuswijk' in the city center of Ghent. Urban Loft offers two private rooms with both their own private terrace and bathroom (both can be reserved separately).

If you like to enjoy, relax and discover Ghent
If you like to start your discovery in a unique place (building, room, environment)
If you are a food lover & desire to discover more?

--> Meaning common ground <--

Urban Loft is your spot.

The space
A double bedroom with a private bathroom AND a private terrace.
It is possible to rent two (identical) rooms when you are travelling with 3 or 4.

Guest access
You have access to your own bedroom, private bathroom and private terrace.
neighborhood_overview:
We are situated in a very unique part of Ghent. Unique in a way that we live within the city center of Ghent amongst a true diversity AND very close to transport possibilities, including railway station (Gent Dampoort) which is in fact the true main station as it is the closest to the city center.

This neighbourhood offers also nice restaurants and places to discover without being annoyed by too many people or noises.
From this place you can discover anything you want within the city center on foot. If you like to explore it differently you can, there are places where you can rent a bike, boat, stand up paddle, ...

You receive our personal recommendations and information in a brochure we have made for our guests. You receive this upon your arrival or earlier.
host_about:
Hi. I am Anissa. Mother of Nina, happily married to my husband Joachim and owner of my business. What do we have in common? Quite some things but what is really clear is that we are all three food (&drink) lovers. 

For business trips I choose to be in an inspiring environment where I can be at ease. I love to learn and support growing other people.

When going on a trip with my family we love to discover places and explore local habits (foods and drinks included ;) as well as beautiful architecture. 
Once in a year we take a longer break were we slow down, reflect on the past year at different levels, relax and enjoy each others presence. 

We also opened 'UrbanLoft' ourselves in Sept 2020. A lovely place in the heart of Ghent /Belgium.

name: Private bedroom in Art (D)eco apartment.
description:
Our apartment is situated close to the city center, with lots of busses stopping in front of the door and the Dampoort train station only 15 minutes walk away. The building is from 1940, and most aspects of our apartment are still original. Therefore it is quite important that you are considerate and treat our place with care :-)
The guest bedroom is all yours, the other places in the house are shared but we are often away in the daytime so you can enjoy plenty of privacy, also in the garden.

The space
The guestroom is situated in the middle of the apartment, therefore some people who are really light sleepers sometimes notice sound from the kitchen or doors opening and closing, mostly around the time when we get up to go to work. Most people seem to be ok with this though.
neighborhood_overview: We have plenty of grocery shops in the street and in the neighborhood, a pharmacy around the corner, banks on the other side of the street, some decent restaurants and a nice bar.
host_about:
Hallo, ik ben Jorid, airbnb-host sinds 2015. Vlak voor corona zijn mijn vriend en ik verhuisd, waardoor we een paar jaar geen airbnb hebben gedaan. We misten de gasten en zetten daarom terug onze (nieuwe) woonst open.
We zijn allebei vegan- en plasticfree-minded, hebben zelf geen wagen en zijn zeer bewust van onze impact, maar verwachten dit niet zozeer van jou, zolang je dit simpelweg respecteert :-) We hopen vooral dat je je thuis voelt bij ons.

name: Ground floor apartment with terrace
description:
- Beautiful and spacious apartment located in a prime location in Ghent.
- Enjoy the terrace in summer
- The apartment is equipped with all modern comfort so that you feel completely at home.
- You will be able to self check-in yourself upon arrival.

The space
This is a perfect accommodation for 2 in a great location in the centre of Gent, easily walkable to the centre of the town, restaurants, cafes, a park and local shops. The kitchen is very well equipped and the apartment has everything you might need. There's a bathroom w shower, sink and toilet. There's an efficient check-in/check-out process.

The accommodation is located on the ground floor (level 0)

The apartment also comes with the following:
- clean 100% cotton sheets and towels - all pressed of course!
- shampoo and shower gel
- basic cooking essentials

We really hope you enjoy yo
neighborhood_overview: We’re situated in the medieval centre of Ghent. The neighborhood is characterized as cozy and vibrant. A lot of restaurants and bars are just around the corner at walking distance. The main attractions in Ghent are easily reached on foot: Korenmarkt, Sint-Michiels church, St Niklaas church, the Belfry, St Baafscathedral, Graslei, Gravensteen, Vrijdagsmarkt, St Jacobs church, Portus Ganda, Patershol, Kouter, etc. You're right in the city center so everything you need is within walking distance; tourist sights, attractions, grocery stores, public transportation, etc. We'll gladly give  you information about all this when you arrive.
host_about:
Being born and raised in Ghent, I have a particulair and profound love for this magnificent city. Although I've always lived here, I still enjoying strolling around, looking up at the beautiful facades of the houses. Everytime I still discover something new, that's why I love this city so much. Ever changing, but yet so full of history.
I enjoy cooking and travelling to far off places to discover new cultures and habits. I hope your stay with us in our city can procure you joy and amazement

name: Spacious bedroom in the green region of Ghent
description:
We're happy to welcome you to our home!

Spacious bedroom on the second floor with kingsize bed (1m80 - box spring mattress), own sink, cosy living area with tea corner and touristic information.

Our shared bathroom has a shower, standalone bath, 2 sinks, toilet and all supplies you need. There's an extra toilet on the ground floor.

You're welcome in our garden with view over the fields! You may use our BBQ during summer.

The space
The room is situated on the second floor of our house. You can only reach it through the stairs in the main hallway. The bathroom is close to your bedroom. All rooms can be locked.

Other things to note
Non-smoking home.
neighborhood_overview: During your stay you'll have 2 FREE bicycle available. Our home is surrounded by nature and lays on the Knooppuntenroute (Google: Fietsnet - knooppunt 69) so there are a lot of bicycle trails a stone's throw away. Our garden borders the fields (hello, cows!) so you'll also find a lot of hiking trails worth a shot.
host_about:
Hi, I’m Louise and I’m living with my fiancé and most adorable cat in Drongen, my hometown since I was born. 

Drongen is only a 15-minute drive away from Ghent. The highway to Bruges and Brussels is around the corner. We lived a few months in the city center of Ghent but I couldn’t miss the countryside so we came back and bought our first home. 
Our best neighbors are the cows & they sure give us a spectacular view from the garden. If you love nature, you can use our bikes and go for a nice drive alongside the river Leie. Drongen is also known as “the green lungs of Ghent”!

This house is 5 minutes by bike from the city center or 15 minutes walking distance. Everything is provided for a comfortable stay (wifi, TV, kitchen, bathroom,). The bedroom is a kind of studio with its own lounge and dining table. Everything is quite close: a shop on the corner of the street, a park around the corner. The space
The studio is on the top floor, is a bright space with its own lounge, TV with google chrome, Tea and coffee is provided. Cutlery and plates + cups are also provided. The Mezannine has a double bed. description:

Enjoy the cool authentic shops such as Tierentyn mustard, the smallest house in Ghent is now a drinking place 't Galgenhuisje. Or taste a delicious Belgian beer in Het Bierhuis on the Waterkant. name: The Blue Room - 1 guests
description:
The Blue Room is located on the first floor. This is a very typical Flemish house so the stairs are very steep and narrow.
If you have had a few too many Belgian beers you could get to the ground floor very quickly!!!
This is a private home that I share with people from every corner of the globe.
I provide a safe environment for everyone.
I ask that every guest respects that this is a shared space and home.
After that, it’s just about having fun…!
I look forward to welcoming you…

Guest access
Check in is from 16:00. Check-out is by 11:00. There is a €5 fee per hour for either early check-in or late check-out. This fee is non-negotiable.

Extra person staying overnight must be asked for in advance with prior approval (before 18:00). The price is €35 a night per extra person, to be paid for in advance.

If you have a guest over for the night without prior approval, a €75 fine will be charged.

De vakantiewoning op het water beschikt over 3 aparte slaapkamers met douche en/of ligbad met zicht op de Muinkschelde. De binnentuin verhoogt het vakantiegevoel alsook de gezellige zitruimte en volledig ingerichte keuken.

Junoboat is gelegen in de Stropkaai, dicht bij het S.M.A.K gent. Gent is een fantastische stad waar er via zijn uitgebreid net van waterwegen tot in het ommeland zeer veel pittoreske hoekjes te ontdekken zijn.

VlotGent biedt je varende terrassen aangedreven met fluister-stille elektromotoren, die enkel op basis van zonne- en windenergie worden voortgestuwd.
host_about:
Hallo,
Wij zijn moeder en dochter en kunnen heel goed samenwerken. Ik werk in de Immo wereld, dus administratieve taken zijn mij niet vreemd. Mijn mama neemt het praktische voor haar rekening (inrichting, poetsen enzoverder). Beide geven we de gasten graag een welkom gevoel aan onze mooie westkust en onze vakantieboot in Gent

name: Imagine! Sleeping in the centre of Medieval Ghent
description:
Burgstraat 17 is an old Patrician house constructed in 1515. Later the house was split in 2 houses and became neglected for many years. In 2019 we started the renovation, with as only purpose, to keep the soul and respect the history and grandeur of the original house.
Its exceptional history, unique architecture and central position made it worth doing so.
Tears, joy and a lot of work resulted in the place where you are right now. We hope you enjoy and respect this place as much as we do.

The space
We created this apartment as a place of relaxation for ourselves. We are proud to share with you
1) Abundance of natural light
2) Authenticity and respect for the history
3) Comfort with subtle flavours of luxury and comfort
4) Personal well-being and relaxation

Other things to note
No breakfast, lunch or dinner services provided
Own linnen: -10€/booking
Own cleaning: -10€/booking

This is a pri

The parking is reachable by car. Normal electricity is available for charging.

name: Be our next Guest in Ghent
description:
We welcome you and offer you a cosy room in our beautiful house in a residential street, in close proximity of public transports to the city center of Ghent. South facing garden. Parking available for free right in front of the property. There are two lovely cats living in the house as well.

The space
We welcome you in our spacious spare room. Bathroom is shared but very large and clean. There is a walk in shower and a large corner bath. Breakfast is served in our open plan kitchen with a view on the south facing garden. During the summer months, breakfast can be served on the terrace or in our outdoor patio area.

Guest access
Parking is free in our street. To enter the city center of Ghent, we advice you to take the Tram. Line 1, direction 'Flanders Expo' will take you to the city center in less than 15 minutes. You get off the tram at 'Gravesteen' or 'Koremarkt' and you're right in the center of Ghent. Travel passes can be foun
neighborhood_overview: Close to the public transport lines into the city center of Ghent.  Close to super markets and other shops, yet, located in a very quite, residential street.
host_about: Graag ontvangen wij (Patrick en ik) u in ons huis in Wondelgem.  Ik ben kunstenaar en maak abstracte schilderijen, foto's en bloemdecoraties.  In ons huis kan je kennis maken met heel wat van mijn werken tijdens jouw verblijf.  Ontbijten kan in de zomer ook buiten op het terras, met zicht op de tuin.

name: Gardencaravan near Ghent in green area
neighborhood_overview: Destelbergen is een kastelengemeente, dicht bij Gent. Er zijn ook veel vijvers en meertjes, waarvan enkel mits toestemming toegankelijk zijn, en de publieke meren kan rond gewandeld worden. Helaas is zwemmen niet toegestaan. Er zijn veel watersporten en kampen in de buurt tijdens de zomer. Het ligt op 10 min rijden van Gent en is op 2min van de oprit van de R4, E40 en E17. Er is een manege , een sauna/wellness complex , een fitness, verschillende lokale restaurantjes, allemaal op 5min rijden. Het nabijgelegen dorp is Lochristi, Beervelde, Laarne waar er mooie wandelingen of fietstochten kunnen gemaakt worden.
host_about: I'm a mom of 2 lovely kids (13 and 21), I love travelling and exploring new areas and places. I love sports like dance(Latin, zouk, ), swimming, beachactivities, hiking, biking, kayak, kitesurfing, snorkling, diving, watersports, horsebackriding, yoga, ... I love to be in nature and go glamping/camping (caravan, tent, camper, tipi, ...), i like to drive my car and just explore new areas. I love cooking (vegan), teaching about healthy food ,& lifestyle( food, bodymovement, massages, dance), organising retreats and workshops, artistic expressions, decorating,  ...

description:

- close to the city centre, Capitole Theatre, Concert Venue Vooruit and the small beguinage;
- Fully equipped kitchen with lots of spices :-);

name: Heaven@11, a jewel among other historic buildings!
description:
Heaven @11 is an apartment on floor 1 & 2 of a small historic house in the medivial center of Gent.
Although the street is a pedestrian zone, you can reach the location by car. Shops, restaurants, museums etc . . .

The space
The apartment is spacious & features a private terras, fully equiped kitchen and large dining area on the first floor. The second floor has a sitting
area with broad library and an ensuite bedroom with flat screen TV, comfortable bed, private bathroom with shower and fast WiFi connection. The view in front and the back of the house are both typical charming scenes of an authentique medieval quarter in East Flanders.
neighborhood_overview: Het Patershol is een oude wijk in het historische centrum van de Belgische stad Gent en telt een gesloten stratenpatroon dat het uit de middeleeuwen heeft bewaard. Deze bijzonder mooie hoek van Gent is een stad-in-de-stad. Vergeet even waar je bent en laat je onderdompelen in de middeleeuwen. Snuif de nostalgie van oude leefgewoonten op. Geniet van architectuur en kunst. En zeker van de pittoreske straten vol gezellige restaurants, volkse cafés en hippe bars. Het Patershol en de omgeving werden in 1981 beschermd als stadsgezicht.

K Vandekerkhove, visual communication

name: Cozy stay in the Historic centre of Ghent
description:
Our trendy accommodation is located in the centre of Ghent. The main market square is only 100 meters away.
There's a private bathroom with toilet, shower and sink.
We offer free Wifi and television.
Public parking "Vrijdagsmarkt" is nearby to park your car: 23€/24h.

There's an efficient check-in/-out process

We look forward to have you stay over with us!

The space
- Your accommodation room is on the ground floor! Please note that you will have to take two little steps down to reach the accommodation.

- Free fast WiFi is available

neighborhood_overview: The accommodation can't be more central (!), located in a very calm alley between the waterside and one of the main shopping streets. Korenmarkt, Vrijdagsmarkt, Gravensteen all super close... The ideal hideout to explore thé most beautiful city of Belgium.
host_about:
Hi, we are Astrid and Gilles, 27 and 33. Born and raised in Moorslede and Bruges, we studied in Ghent and in Brussels. We fell in love and decided to settle in the beautiful city of Ghent. Whilst looking for a place to live, we bumped into what could be considered as one of the most centralised houses of Ghent. The house was old, dark and didn’t catch a lot of sunlight, but we saw a lot of possibilities to transform it into a little paradise in the ancient centre, close to all the hip and trendy places this city has to offer. As we travel a lot ourselves, we think we know what it takes to have a pleasant stay and discovering new cities and countries. We transformed the house in an ideal place for friends and guests visiting Ghent. By the summer of 2020 the house was finished.   
We hope you enjoy it as much as we do. 
Welcome in Ghent! 
Astrid & Gilles

Privé slaapkamer in een gezellig rijhuisje te Gent.

The space
Een lichtrijke slaapkamer met een twijfelaarbed (breedte 120, lengte 200 cm) en bad. De badkamer met douche (op hetzelfde verdiep) wordt gedeeld met de bewoner. Koffie en thee zijn beschikbaar op de kamer.

Guest access
De woning is eenvoudig te bereiken met het openbaar vervoer. Er is een busverbinding op het einde van de straat. Daarnaast is er ook gratis parking voor de deur of op de buurtparking.

name: Villa Brutalisma* Famed Architect! Nature @t Gent
description:
Exentrieke Scandinavische villa is gebouwd & geklasseerd bij Naoorlogs Erfgoed Vlaanderen . Op een boogscheut van het charmante Gent . Ideaal voor 10 personen. Verhoogde Zuid patio met zicht op natuurgebied , paardjes en kastelen en bossen. Een buurtwinkeltje 7/7 open is. Bakkers & Hazenveld & Galische hoeve een heel fijne brouwerij op wandelafstand.
Hier vertoeven is een beleving , grote tuin & klein bosje met vuurpit en boomhutje
Stad & natuur gaan hier hand in hand . Welkom & Enjoy!

The space
De villa is in de vorm van een vlinder. Volledig symmetrisch en alles is nog maar net verbouwd van 2020. Een open keuken met zicht op de velden, terras met de zon die opkomt. Een eetruimte , een living met als hart een gezellige pellet kachel in het midden. Een bureelruimte ( met slaapsofa voor 2 personen) Beneden een eigen badkamer met toilet. Bovenverdiep telt 3 slaapkamers. + Badkamer met bad en douche. Een mezzanine met leesplekje .

Guest acc
neighborhood_overview:
Op Fietsafstand van het historisch centrum Gent ( 5 km)
De villa kijkt uit op velden en kastelen . Prachtige wandelomgeving!
Een subtropisch zwembad & Wellness op wandelafstand ( 2 km)
Een prachtige brouwerij met heerlijk bier en lekker eten ( 1 km)
2 Bakkers & top slager op 100 meter .
Buurtwinkel 7/7 op 100 meter
Fietsverhuur ( 3 km)
Galische hoeve ( 1 km )
host_about:
We Are Travellers. How adventurous are you?
Collect moments, not things...
Travelling is like falling in love, you are less critical and only see the nice things...
Hi dear friends!! Welcome to Casita Loquita!!

name: Spacious studio near Ghent
description:
Spacious studio appartment near Ghent

The space
Spacious studio of 40m² near Ghent. The studio appartment is located on the ground floor and has its own entrance. There is a kitchen/dining area, seperate dressing room, small bathroom with shower and sink and a bedroom/living room. The toilet is in the hallway. Towels, coffee, tea, kitchen supplies,... are provided. Free parking space available upon request.

Guest access
There is a seperate entrance provided. There is a terrace that can be used.

Other things to note
Please note the appartment is located near the highway. This may cause some noise disturbance.
neighborhood_overview: This residential neighboorhood is called Gentbrugge. It is located 3km from the historical center of Ghent.  There is a large forest at 150 meters with running circuit, playground etc. There is a another park across the street. Several shops within reach.

The badroom combines vintage with modern comfort.
The breakfast with fresh orange juice is served in always served in the room. Gluten free, vegan or lactose free breakfast is available upon request.

name: Knus appartementje nabij Gent
description:
Er is een aparte ingang, waarbij u uitkomt in een hal. Via enkele trappen naar boven komt u uit bij de slaapkamer, living, volledig ingerichte keuken en badkamer.

Een gedeelte van de tuin is ter beschikking. Fietsen kunnen worden geborgen in het tuinhuis en/of de garage.

Op aanvraag kan ook uw elektrische wagen worden opgeladen via een eigen laadpaal mits vergoeding van de kosten.

The space
Badkamer met ligbad, twee lavabo’s, toilet, handdoeken en haardroger.

Slaapkamer met tweepersoonsbed, goede matras en voorzien van donsdeken en hoeslakens. Ruime kleerkasten met hangers. Extra beddengoed is ter beschikking. De slaapkamer kan perfect worden verduisterd.

Keuken met koelkast, diepvries, microgolf, inductiekookplaat, microgolf, oven, broodrooster, senseo koffiezet, waterkoker, vaatwas en het benodigd kookgerei. Er is gratis koffie en thee ter beschikking.

Tuin met tuinhuis, tuinmeubilair en een barbecue.
neighborhood_overview: Gelegen in het mooie Lievegem op 8 km van het centrum van Gent en op 38 km van Brugge. Vlakbij wandel- en fietsroutes (o.a. Lieveroute). Ben je hier voor zaken dan kan je ook bij ons terecht gezien onze strategische ligging: dicht bij de autosnelwegen E17 en E40 alsook bij het industrie- en havengebied. Op een heel korte afstand heb je keuze uit diverse restaurants met een Belgische, Franse, Italiaanse of Chinese keuken..
host_about: Werkzaam als freelance consultant, open en geïnteresseerd in mensen uit andere landen en culturen, hou van reizen en nieuwe mensen ontmoeten.

name: Whole Apartment 3 mins. from Central Train Station
description:
Cozy apartment 3 minutes from the central train station of Ghent, thanks to which it has great, direct transport options to all Belgian airports and transport hubs, big cities like Brussels, Bruges, and Antwerp, and all major attractions.

Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom, two double bed bedrooms, and located in a lovely neighborhood. The apartment is also well-connected with all of Ghent's own hotspots thanks to the biggest public transport hub of Ghent being next to the station(!5 person)

The space
The apartment is on the third floor of a renovated building in one of the best-located streets in Ghent. The guests can make use of the whole apartment; two double-bed bedrooms, a balcony, bathroom, living room, and kitchen.

Since this is an offer for the entire apartment, double reservations with different groups of guests at the same time will never occur for this offer. The two double beds can accommodate four people in total, and if necess
neighborhood_overview: The street is surrounded by a variety of local restaurants, bars, bakers, a fresh fruit shop, and a grocery store. There are also multiple basic necessity shops open at night. Finally, Ghent’s most renowned museums and biggest municipal park are all a 5 to 15 minute walk away from the front door.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Ana, and I love to travel, meet people from new cultures, and make my guests feel right at home!

Everyone is most welcome at my Airbnb, so I hope to receive you soon! 

Check out our available dates and let me know if you have any questions. 

Kind regards from your host, 
Ana Grey

name: Sleeping on a boat - Ecohostel
description:
Ship ahoy!
Looking for a hostel that shows the spirit of Ghent? Somehow different, friendly, fun, but most of all relaxed?

It's not everyday you can be a pirate, you might as well go for it! Don't forget that land was only created to provide a place for boats to moor... You'll find the boat on a lazy canal just outside the historic centre, quiet, lush and green.

So hopefully you'll love Ghent as much as we do!!

The space
We offer 4 rooms, two with a double bed, one room with 3 bunk beds and one room with 4 bunk beds.
Bed linnen is included in the price, as well as pillows and duvets.

The hostel can at the moment only be booked completely. The number of people staying is up to you but maximum 12. A group with more than 12 can contact us for possible reservations with more guests.
neighborhood_overview: We are moored in a lively neighbourhood,  1,5 km from the Korenmarkt (middle of the citycenter)...

name: Camping with your own tent in a private wood
description:
Bring your tents and camp with your own camping gear in a private wood in the green area around Ghent. The wood is located on the property of 4000m2, next to the garden.You will be able to use a pic-nic table (max 8 people), a barbecue and a hammock. You can take a walk in the forest or enjoy a nice, relaxing evening in the nature. Maximum of 8 people are allowed. The bathroom is situated in the property on the first floor. Stay in your own bubble and enjoy nature!

The space
The camping area is located in the private forest, next to the garden. There is a place where you can set-up your own tents. A maximum of 8 persons are allowed. During your stay, you can use the pic-nic table and barbecue for food preparation. The toilet and shower are located on the first floor of the house (30m walk).
There is a hammock where you can relax.

Guest access
You will have access to the forest, the pic-nic table and hammock.
The bathroom is used
neighborhood_overview: Residential neighborhood in the green area around Ghent. Possibility of walk and bike tours in the countryside and along the river Leie. Close to Blaarmeersen recreation area and nature reserve Bourgoyen and Assels.

name: The Green Attic Ghent - free parking&bikes
description:
The loft is located in a quiet neighbourhood about 4 kilometers away from the city centre of Ghent. We have FREE & SECURED parking for your car. ♡ There is a tramline just around the corner that goes straight to the city centre. (+- 20 minutes) We have city bikes that can be used.

The space
The loft is located on the second floor of our house.(attic)
It has a small kitchenette with an electric stove, microwave/oven, refrigerator + freezer, kitchen set and sink. Everything you need to provide your own meals is there.
There is a sitting area, as well as a double bed. There is a bathroom provided in the same space with a freestanding bath and sink. We have fresh towels, shampoo and showergel. There is also a private toilet in the same room behind a door. (enclosed) There is a tv with cable and hdmi for laptop.
Both the kitchen and the bathroom are build only a few months ago, so everything is in perfect condition. The whole studio is open with a lo
neighborhood_overview:
It’s a nice quiet street. The public transport is just around the corner. If you walk 5 minutes you have a square that’s called Vanbeverenplein. There you have some shops: supermarket, pharmacy, snackbars, night shops, butchery, bakery,...

If you want to have a proper dinner i advice to go to the city center.
host_about:
Hoi! 

Wij zijn Veronique en Maël, moeder en dochter, twee beste vriendinnen. 
Wij runnen samen de Green Attic en de Cosy studio in Gent, België. 
Wij werken beiden fulltime als kleuterleidster in het onderwijs en runnen de airbnb's na onze werkuren. 

We houden er van om iedereen een thuis gevoel te bezorgen, hier bij ons in Gent. 
Welkom ❤️

name: Unique experience - spacious boathouse near center
description:
Cosy yet spacious and warmly decorated design appartment at my house boat, the Aurelia Feria.

- a 15min walk to the city center and at 2min walk from the train station.

- ATTENTION: be aware,the airbnb is adjacent to my private living area. You have the airbnb space to yourself but the wall between the 2 parts is not accoustically isolated so for sound you are not completely private. You can not see each other, but you can hear sounds from the other side .

The space
you have a whole space of 60m2 to yourself, next to my private part of the boat.

Furthermore there is a spacious deck to enjoy the sun and views as well as a glass roof above the living area that opens to have a cool breeze or lots of natural light streaming in. It is exceptional for a houseboat to draw so much light in. In winter there is a cosy stove to keep your feet warm.

you can expect:
- a bath in front of a window looking out on the water, wit
neighborhood_overview:
The boat is located at the entrance of the 'new docks' (Nieuwe Dokken), an area just next to the center where in the past this was an industrial area, operating over water.
This whole area (that used to be 'the old docks') has recently been developed (and still is) with areas to live, schools, open space, playground, beach, bars, cycling path, walking path, etc. New neighboorhood that due to Corona is now also being discovered by the Ghentians, for walking and cycling, and for water activities. It is still a quiet place so close to the city, train station and the ring of Ghent. But fun on the water (lots of kayaking, little boats, rubber boats, paddle boarding) is popular nowadays and it comes close, since you are also on the water ,-) and people are curious to see life on a boat.

The boat is next to a quay and a cycling path. There is no car road, only a simple road where residents can load and unload the car, as can you if you come with the car.

Unfortun
host_about:
Hi, I am Lies and i live on the houseboat with my 2 children, Viggo and Raffi. They alternate between me and their dad every other week.  

 I bought the Aurelia Feria end of 2017. It is a 'spits', used to be a cargo boat of 40 m long and was build end of the 60's. 

Since January 2020 the boat is back at its permanent own spot on the water after a thorough renovation. 

And my children as well as me are enjoying our new home to the fullest, even though it is not completely finished and I can not see, feel or smell paint anymore. 

The boat is also used for my coaching practice, to guide groups and individuals on their 'quest' to connection, with themselves, with others and with the world around them. 

 Finally, I also wish to offer it to people all around the world to come and experience life on a boat and discover the fantastic city of Ghent, where I have been living for the last 20 years. 

Let me know what the space brings you or still needs to serve its purpose. 

For people who are interested in exploring themselves, a coaching session can also be arranged :-)

name: Cosy Cabin Deurle, een uniek Tiny House.
description:
Het is een mooi en privé tiny house in de buurt van een pittoresk dorp.
Het is geplaatst in een residentiële maar rustige en groene omgeving, op 5 minuten wandelen van het dorpscentrum.
Je kan de fietsen nemen en Deurle en Sint Martens Latem ontdekken of een dagje Gent!

The space
Het is een mooi en privé tiny house in de buurt van een pittoresk dorp.
Het is geplaatst in een residentiële maar rustige en groene omgeving, op 5 minuten wandelen van het dorpscentrum.
Je kan de fietsen nemen en Deurle en Sint Martens Latem ontdekken of een dagje Gent!
Ga picknicken aan de oevers van de Leie en neem de mooie wandelroutes. Sluit de dag af in een van de vele leuke restaurantjes of ga lekker BBQ-en in de tuin en zet de vuurplaats aan om te genieten van de warmte en het geluid van knetterend brandend hout.

De Cosy Cabin is een voorbeeld van de zeer populaire Tiny houses.
Het staat niet in 'the middle of nowhere', het staat in ee
neighborhood_overview:
Deurle won de benoeming tot mooiste dorp van Oost-Vlaanderen!
Deurle is bekend om zijn musea en toprestaurants. De mooiste wandel- en fietsroutes, vergezichten en natuur.
Neem de fietsen die bij de Cabin horen en ontdek Deurle en Sint-Martens-Latem of huur een privé bootje om de rivier te volgen tot in het centrum van Gent! Maar de knusse Cabin laat u de mogelijkheid om te BBQ-en in de tuin of de vuurplaats aan te steken om te genieten van de warmte en het lawaai van brandend hout.
host_about:
Hoi, ik ben Michelle, 30 jaar en als hoofdberoep ben ik freelance makeup artieste in de film en tv sector.
Maar on the side ben ik de fiere uitbater van de Cosy Cabin. Ik hoop jullie binnenkort te mogen verwelkomen. 
Liefs 
Michelle
