name: Ruime bovenverdieping vlakbij centrum van Gent.
description:
Vanuit onze gezinswoning in Ledeberg is het centrum van Gent vlot bereikbaar, zowel met de fiets als het openbaar vervoer. Straatparkeren aan laag tarief. De ganse bovenverdieping van onze bel-etagewoning is ter beschikking en bestaat uit een slaapkamer, badkamer, zitruimte en koffiehoek. Er is zeer veel licht en het geeft een ruim gevoel.

The space
In de slaapkamer is een persoonlijke kast beschikbaar, alsook een klerenhanger en wat opbergruimte.
In de zitruimte kan je genieten van een plaat (platendraaier aanwezig).
In de koffiehoek wordt thee en koffie aangeboden, tegen vrije bijdrage.

Other things to note
We hebben een kat Oreo. (voor wie allergisch is) In de verblijfsruimte is roken niet toegestaan. Rokers kunnen in de stadstuin roken.
neighborhood_overview: Gent is een prachtige historische stad met een dynamisch karakter. Het centrum begint op 4 km van de Air BnB. Als je de tram neemt aan de kerk van Ledeberg (op 800m) ben je er zo.

name: The Cover hostel
description:
Welcome to 'The Cover': new and charming hostel located in the middle of the historical center of Ghent. Located on the beautiful Vrijdagmarkt, the perfect spot to explore the historical, cultural and night life in Ghent. All facilities are available and free to use: kitchen, showers (6), washer and dryer, lockers, dining room, relaxation room, free WIFI. We are looking forward to welcome you!

The space
The hostel is a part of the multi-purpose bar 'The Cover'. Well-known in and around Ghent for his unique atmosphere. Grab a great Belgian beer at the bar, watch one of the many bands or dj's playing in the evening or just enjoy the amazing view from the terrace. Don't worry: the hostel is separated from the bar so you can still relax the silence and charm if you prefer so. All the major spots for sight-seeing, exploring, nightlife, culture or museums are just a walk away.

name: ★Lovely gorgeous duplex  w A/C near centre★
description:
This two story accomodation is perfect for up to 8 people visiting the lovely city of Ghent. It's located in the historic Saint-Macharias neighborhood, where Ghent originated! Nowadays it's a quiet area along the river, with many parks ánd at walking distance of the new city centre.
The place you will be staying at has 2 double beds, a bunk bed and a sofa bed, for up to 8 people. Furthermore two bathrooms, 2 fully equipped kitchen, airco, WiFi,... everything you need for a nice holiday!

The space
Modern, beautiful and practical, that's what we were aiming for:
- 3 bedrooms with 2 double beds (4p), one bed can be split into 2 single beds (on request), a bunk bed (2p) and a sofa bed (2p)
- enough closet space to put away your clothes and other luggage
- 2 bathrooms with rain shower, a double and single sink, 2 toilets
- fully equipped kitchen with a fridge on both floors
- water boiler and coffee machine for hot beverages
- wash
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the historical city center of Ghent. Now a lovely quiet family area, near the water for a stroll besides the house boats and through the parks. Local shops and restaurants are closeby and the city centre at 10m walking, where you find many more bars and shops, and of course the great attractions of Ghent!
host_about: Hi! My name is Kit Teng :). I’m here to go above and beyond to ensure all our guests enjoy their stay and to provide the best quality customer service possible. I’m blessed to call Ghent my home. I like to spend my free time with my family & friends. I love enjoying what our beautiful city has to offer. We look forward to hosting you and providing you the best Airbnb experience.

name: Oude jeneverbrouwerij van 1740
description:
Het huis dateert van 1740 en was origineel een jeneverbrouwerij. In 2017 werd het volledig gerenoveerd met behoud van zoveel mogelijk authentieke elementen in combinatie met een eigentijdse inrichting. De houten balken en vloeren brengen je terug naar vroeger, de stalen trappen, moderne afwerking en het losstaand bad doen je genieten en ontspannen in stijl. Er is plaats voor maximum 6 personen. Je hebt 3 slaapkamers (met telkens een tweepersoonsbed) en 2 badkamers als je Peper boekt.

The space
Peper is eat, sleep, wine. Op het gelijkvloers vind je ons restaurant waar je kan lunchen en dineren. We hebben een authentieke wijnkelder en werken met een coole wijnmachine waar je kan proeven van 16 verschillende wijnen. Vanaf het eerste verdiep kom je in onze gerestaureerde B&B waar je met maximum 6 personen kan verblijven. Eerste verdieping: een gezellige living met een volledig uitgeruste kitchenette, bar en sofa. De originele houten vloeren en balken bleven behou
neighborhood_overview: Peper ligt op 5 minuten van het Gravensteen en op 8 minuten van de Korenmarkt in een rustige buurt. Naast ons vind je het oude Elisabeth Begijnhof wat zeker een bezoekje waard is.
host_about: Welkom bij Peper. Peper is eat, sleep, wine. Samen met mijn man Philip hebben we een restaurant, wijnbar en B&B in Gent.

name: Peaceful countryside studio close to Ghent
description:
Zeer landelijk en rustig geleden peaceful countryside studio close to Ghent. Gelegen op 4 km van centrum Drongen (aan de Leie) en op 10km van Gent. De studio staat los van de landelijke woning en is voorzien van alle nodige comfort en ruimte. U kan gebruik maken van een ruim afgesloten privé parking en carport, twee fietsen en een bbq staan ter beschikking. Onder het overdekte terrasje kan u volop genieten van rust en zon. Een warm en hartelijk ontvangst maken dit onvergetelijk.

The space
De met oude bouwmaterialen gebouwde eiken studio 'De Liberteyt' biedt je naast sfeer en warmte een oase aan rust. De studio is onder meer uitgerust met gezellige sfeerverlichting, Tv, wifi, frigo en eigen muziek via het sonos systeem. Onder het overdekte privé buitenterrasje kan u volop genieten van zon en rust.
neighborhood_overview: U bevindt zich op fietsafstand van dag behoeften en op 4km van het centrum van Drongen waar u alle nodige comfort makkelijk kan terugvinden. Wandel, fiets en zelfs boottochten zijn allen vlakbij. Per fiets of met de bus ben je op amper 10km van het stadscentrum verwijderd. Dit wordt zonder meer genieten.

name: Urban Loft | A unique spot in Ghent
description:
Welcome at Urban Loft. We created this place situated in 'Machariuswijk' in the city center of Ghent. Urban Loft offers two BBNT's (Bedroom, Bathroom and private terrace). We have a unique location that is easily reachable by train, bike, bus or even by car!

If you like to start your discovery in a unique place (building, room, environment) and receive our personal recommendations, then this is your 'go to' place.

Love to host you and communicate in NL/FR/ENG,
Urban Greetings,
Anissa

The space
This space is unique because of its own character. The building is entirely renovated in 2020 and offers you a beautiful place to stay within the city center of Ghent without any disturbing noise.

However this space doesn't have a kitchen.

Guest access
You have access to a double bedroom with a private bathroom AND a private terrace. If you come by bike you can park your bike, SUP, motorcycle, ...at our plo
neighborhood_overview:
We are situated in a very unique part of Ghent. Unique in a way that we live within the city center of Ghent amongst a true diversity of city members of this city AND very close to transport possibilities, including railway station (Gent Dampoort) which is in fact the true main station as it is the closest to the city center.

This neighbourhood offers also nice restaurants and places to discover without being annoyed by too many people or noises.
From this place you can discover anything you want within the city center on foot. If you like to explore it differently you can, there are places where you can rent a bike, boat, stand up paddle, ...
host_about:
Hi. I am Anissa. Mother of Nina, happily married to my husband Joachim and owner of my business. What do we have in common? Quite some things but what is really clear is that we are all three food (&drink) lovers. 

For business trips I choose to be in an inspiring environment where I can be at ease. I love to learn and support growing other people.

When going on a trip with my family we love to discover places and explore local habits (foods and drinks included ;) as well as beautiful architecture. 
Once in a year we take a longer break were we slow down, reflect on the past year at different levels, relax and enjoy each others presence. 

We also opened 'UrbanLoft' ourselves in Sept 2020. A lovely place in the heart of Ghent /Belgium.

I provide a safe environment for everyone.

After that, it’s just about having fun…!
I look forward to welcoming you…

neighborhood_overview: Gent zijn torens, zijn rechtvaardige rechters, zijn circulatieplan en zijn neuzekensoorlog: je vindt het allemaal in de coolste stad van Vlaanderen. Bereikbaar met fiets, openbaar vervoer of de wagen. Antwerpen, Brussel, Brugge en de Kust op 50 min  . De ideale uitvalsbasis om Vlaanderen en rest van de wereld te verkennen! Verken je liever de natuur! Verschillende fiets- en wandelroutes langs de Schelde, Gentbrugse Meersen, Kalkense Meersen, Donk Meer, Munte, 't Burreken, Drongengoed... de ideale uitvalsbasis om Vlaanderen in al zijn pracht te ontdekken!

name: Gezellige studio met tuin
description:
De studio met tuin bevindt zich een 6 tal km van het centrum van Gent. Er is openbaar vervoer op 100meter, en ook een Carrefour. Er is gratis parkeergelegenheid langs de straat voor het huis.
De studio is vernieuwd. Het terras bevindt zich aan de zuidkant.
Een heerlijke plek om te genieten van de rust van de tuin en toch dicht bij het centrum.
De studio is voor 2 tot 3 personen.

The space
De studio bevindt zich in de tuin van de verhuurder en heeft een apart stukje tuin.
Om de studio te betreden komt men doorheen de tuin van de verhuurder

Other things to note
Ik heb een hond labrador.
Het is een lieve speelse hond,
blaft wel even als nieuwe mensen de tuin betreden.

name: Gloednieuw Appartement in Historisch Centrum Gent
description:
Gezellige gloednieuwe moderne en lichtrijke flat in hartje historisch centrum Gent, volledig ter beschikking met alle nutsvoorzieningen (keukengerei, handdoeken, bedlinnen wifi,...). Gelegen vlakbij de mooiste bezienswaardigheden, restaurants, Vrijdagmarkt, Korenmarkt, St Baafsplein, Belfort, St Baafskathedraal..., parking vlakbij, 30 mn. naar Brussel of Brugge, vlot bereikbaar met openbaar vervoer (vlakbij een bushalte, 2 mn van Dampoort), op 10 mn stappen van Dampoort treinstation. Terrasje.

The space
Het appartement is ideaal gelegen op de tweede verdieping van een nieuw gebouw, op 100 meter van Sint Jacobs, historisch centrum Gent. Supersnel internet, digitale televisie, nieuwe volledige keuken, alles om van een super-verblijf in deze prachtige stad te genieten.

Guest access
Het appartement is integraal tot jullie beschikking.

Nieuw ingerichte loft in historisch pand "Het Oranjehof". Vlakbij de portaalsite van het Parkbos van Gent. De loft is op de bovenste verdieping van het gebouw. In het gebouw is beneden het restaurant Pulpo waar je kan genieten van een heerlijke lunch of diner.

De loft is uitgerust met een boxspring Queensize bed, lounge zetel, inrichte badkamer met douche. Wifi, internet TV (TV-Vlaanderen, Netflix, ...)

name: Ruime woning aan Gentse stadsrand - Lange verhuur
description:
We verhuren graag ons huis terwijl we er zelf op uit trekken. Onze charmante en lichtrijke woning met herenhuis allures biedt je veel ruimte, op 10-15 min fietsen van centrum Gent en 5 min fietsen van de Gentbrugse Meersen, een leuk natuurgebied.

Due to a temporary stay abroad we like to rent out our home to people like us, looking for a new environment. Our charming & bright home offers you ample space, 10-15 min cycling to the city center of Ghent & 5 min to a natural area

The space
- Gelijkvloers: lichtrijke leefkeuken met kookeiland, tafel en toegang tot koer, woonruimte met zetel en tafeltje dat eventueel als bureau kan dienen, TV (enkel Netflix en Streamz), gang met toilet, toegang tot kelder
- Eerste verdiep: grote slaapkamer met dressing, nineties badkamer met bad en vernieuwde douche en wasmachine
- Zolderverdiep: deze ruimte moeten we nog verder opfrissen, maar proper genoeg om spullen te leggen of je was te drogen.
neighborhood_overview:
- Op 300m: de Schelde (verkeersvrij wandelen en fietsen), bakker, leuk restaurantje voor afhaal, frituur, parkje
- Op 800m-1km: buurtwinkels, supermarkten
- Op 1,5km: E17 op/afrit Gentbrugge, Gentbrugse Meersen natuurgebied
- Op 2,5-3km: stadscentrum Gent
host_about:
We are Céline and Benjamin, always looking for the next travel adventure! 
Update 2021: For the first time we want to try out renting out our  own home while we are out exploring new places. Do not hesitate to contact us for any questions!

name: Gent Logeerplek dichtbij gezellige stadscentrum
description: Wij wonen in één van de leukste huizen in één van de leukste buurten van Gent. Gasten hebben de hele bovenste verdieping ter beschikking. Na 3 minuutjes wandelen ben je in het gezellige stadscentrum. Je proeft, voelt en ziet de sfeer van Gent van zodra je de deur uit bent. In onze wijk zijn er veel lekkere restaurants en gezellige koffiebars. Je kan ook een hele fijne graffitiwandeling doen (een plannetje geven we je mee) of lekker gaan uitwaaien in de Oude Dokken.
neighborhood_overview: Ons huis ligt op 5 minuten stappen van Oudburg en het Patershol, gezellige kasseistraten met veel lekkere restaurantjes. Op 7 minuten stappen ben je aan het Gravensteen, de middeleeuwse burcht pal in het centrum.

name: Charming guest house in the back of a garden.
description:
Our charming house near the city center is situated in the back of our garden. It is accessable through a separate entrance. The ground floor consists of a spacious bedroom with a terrace. The first floor has a trendy living room, sofa bed, open kitchen and bathroom with a shower. You will find all modern comfort. The authentic master bedroom on the top floor includes a comfortable and quiet working space . A perfect spot for tourists and professionals!

The space
This renovated coach house offers all comfort such as wifi, TV and a separate entrance with access code. There is a modern kitchen, bathroom and two separate toilets. Perfect for two couples or a family with children, but also for professionals looking for a long stay. The spacious bedrooms are also suitable as a work/study place. Privacy is guaranteed at all times. You can sit in the sun on the terrace or even play a game of table tennis.
neighborhood_overview:
Our 19th century house is located on a quiet street in a lively neighborhood. The train station is nearby, and the old town is at a 15-minute walk. There are plenty of trendy places for wining and dining.
De Nieuwe Dokken, one of the newest and most innovative districts of Ghent, is a little further away. Those who like to walk or run can easily visit the Gentbruggemeersen, a beautiful nature reserve. On foot, by bike or public transport: there is always something to enjoy in Gent.

name: Verne Dreams : Oxford Loft
description:
Verne Dreaming is een fantastische keuze voor reizigers in Gent. Het biedt een romantische omgeving en veel nuttige voorzieningen voor tijdens je verblijf. Dompel je onder in Oxford, de Engelse kamer in Napoleon groen.

Verne Dreaming is een Bed & Experience, het biedt tevens Tarot lezingen (www.tarotmerlot.be) en meditatie (www.qimono.be) aan.

Gastheer Vincent Verschooris (www.shelter7.be) ontvangt U en bezorgt U mede een onvergetelijke ervaring. Laat je door Gent gidsen door een local hero!
host_about:
A Guardian of the Wabi-Sabi art that I express into my lifestyle and the interior of Shelter 7 and Verne Dreams. Explore it during your stay and immerse yourself in my (hidden) personal artwork. 
I’m tend to be a content and positive person, always curious to meet new people and connect with new energies.

name: Completely furnished and equipped house
description:
Want to experience Ghent as a local? Here you get a whole, completely furbished and equipped house, so you can enjoy the city. We lived here for 7 years and left the house as it is, including toys for kids etc. You can use everything. The house is in a neighborhood just outside the centre, tram stop 1 is a very short walk away and there is also a bus stop nearby. We have AC on the top floor in the big bedroom and mobile AC in the bedroom on the 2nd floor. Beware: steep stairs to go to 3rd floor!

The space
The house is completey furnished, equipped. You can immediately start living there. We used to host one room only, when we were still living there ourselves. To see feedback about that, look under "Swonnie's double room". We had lots of guests with lots of positive reviews. This time, it will be different, as we will not be there ourselves, but still, the house remains, completely ready and close to the centre. Game console: we offer the base of Nintento Switch
neighborhood_overview: The neigborhood used to be a working-class area for the workers in the nearby factories who were all closed in the nineties. The area is now in an upward spiral, as it is close to the centre. Lots of young families are moving in. It is also very multicultural. There are lots of shops and restaurants too. And also lots of green parks and areas.

name: Charming house nearby city center
description:
Ideal location for those who want to explore Ghent on foot and still like to sleep peacefully. There are 2 full bedrooms, each with a double bed of 160cm wide. In the attic there is an extra room with a sofa bed (120cm). Equipped kitchen and bathroom with bath. There is wifi and TV. It is a charming, small but cozy house and it will become nice and warm inside in no time. Bed, bath and kitchen linen available. Parking in the street at a daily rate of 6 euros.

The space
The house itself is cozy and authentic. There is a travel baby bed and toys for those who want to come as a family. There are 2 toilets in the house and a bathtub in the bathroom. Equipped kitchen with gas stove, oven, microwave, coffee maker, kettle and a kitchen blender. Coffee, tea and herbs are provided. After every guest visit, there is thorough ventilation, cleaning and disinfection. There is disinfectant gel in the living room. Very welcome here!

Guest access
You have
neighborhood_overview: The location is perfect: in 15 minutes you are in the center on foot and you sleep very quietly here. Older people, students, families with children live there, ... it's a diverse neighbourhood. In the Ooilamstraat itself there is a pleasant atmosphere between the neighbours, many know each other well and there is very little traffic in the street. In the immediate vicinity (max 5min walking) there are 3 parks, with or without a playground, and also several restaurants that are not touristy at all. Nearby there is the Lousbergmarkt where you can buy local organic products or get a takeaway meal. Gent-Dampoort station is a 10-minute walk away. You can also rent bicycles there. In short, you never have to go far to find what you are looking for.

name: "Desk till Dawn"
description:
Ruim duplex-designerappartement met dakterras.

Het ultieme genot van dit appartement is dat het ruim is. Het is 175 m2 groot inclusief het terras. Alle leefruimtes zijn nauwkeurig en verrassend met elkaar verbonden. Je hoeft het met niemand te delen behalve met de aanwezigheid van onze plantencollectie.

Op verzoek is er privé parkeergelegenheid en kan je van onze eigen fietsen gebruik maken. Beleef meer in minder tijd !

Trein en bus zijn vlakbij.

The space
De leefruimtes van het appartement liggen op de tweede verdieping in het gebouw. Deze verdieping is bereikbaar met een lift. Vanaf de eigenzinnig privé inkomhall zijn de volgende ruimtes onmiddellijk bereikbaar: Keuken, eetplaats, berging, bureau en de zitruimte.
De keuken is volledig uitgerust en voorzien van een kookeiland. Het buitenterras is vanaf hier bereikbaar via een schuifraam. De aparte eetplaats is vanaf de keuken zichtbaar doorheen een doorkijkkast.
Er is
neighborhood_overview:
De buurt is voorzien van een ruim aanbod van basisvoorzieningen.

Naast de aanwezigheid van ons geliefde historische stadscentrum vinden wij het Rozenbroekepark het leukst in onze buurt. De ingang van dat park ligt op 350 meter. Het bevat een dichtbebost gebied met oudere bomen en eveneens open gedeelten. Perfect om de dag met een frisse neus te starten of af te sluiten.
Er zijn Finse pistes aangelegd voor de sportievelingen maar ook smalle asfalt- en betonwegjes voor de fietsers en wandelaars. Ook een speeltuin is voorzien. Op het einde van het park, op 1,5 km wandelen van het appartement is er het Olympisch zwembad (Lago Rozenbroeken). Er zijn eveneens wellness mogelijkheden en recreatiebaden met glijbanen.

Eveneens vlakbij:

Supermarkten:
100 meter (Colruyt - ook open op zaterdag)
350 meter (Delhaize - ook open op zondag)
650 meter (kleine Delhaize supermarkt bij tankstation Q8 - 24/24 7/7 open)

name: Unique Spacious Riverside w/ balcony - Patershol
description:
Free parking at Park&ride 20mins away with tram!

You stay in the middle of the historical center of the gorgeous city Ghent - you are next to the beautiful river "Leie". You have a balcony with a view on the river.

Equipped with Cable TV, Smart TV, free WiFi, PS4, Surround Sound System,...

The property is centrally located and only a few minutes away from the historic city towers, the impressive Castle Gravensteen and much more! One if the most beautiful cities in the region.

The space
The appartment is on the second floor.

We make sure it's clean and decontaminated after each guest stay.

- Queen size bed
- Sleeper Sofa
- High Speed wifi
- Cable TV
- Smart TV
- Lots of natural light
- Relaxing view on the river
- Fully Equipped Kitchen with everything you need to cook
- A place centrally located to downtown, restaurants, shops, hospital, walking,...

Guest
neighborhood_overview:
The appartement is located in one of the most famous streets of Ghent, Oudburg. This street has the most restaurants and bars of the whole city, and it’s located in the heart of Patershol. Small streets with cute little stores and even more restaurants.

Only few minutes walking and you can enjoy the views on the amazing Castle, the big squares and the three beautiful towers of Ghent.

You have a view on the river where you will be able to do boat tours and even kayaking if you want.
host_about:
Hi, I'm a life enjoying pure belgian. I'm easy going and open minded.

39 years later I’m an entrepreneur with a passion to help people. Always looking to improve myself so I can give my guests the best stay as possible.

The space

There are a lot of windows.
The rooms are located under the roof, but have high ceilings and the 2 main rooms have a mezzanine, which makes the rooms very spacious.
There is a curtain to block the light on the sleep mezzanine, not very well visible on the pictures.

The kitchen is fully equiped, there is a duvet in the bedroom and lots of pillows.
I offer clean towels an
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a nice quiet neighbourhood. There is a park by the water, 2minutes walkingdistance. There is also a nature reserve 10minutes walking away, where you can go for a run or just enjoy nature. We live close to the water so nice scenery's all around. (I can give some good tips for nice jogging routes!)
Public transport is very acessible from our house and can bring you to the station, the citycenter or where ever. The highway is also easy acces, E17,E40 and R4.

Voor de gasten die met de wagen naar de stad komen kunnen wij een beveiligde parkeerplaats voorzien in de straat tegen betaling (15€ per etmaal).

The space
De studio bij St.-Anna ligt op wandelafstand van het historisch centrum van Gent.

Guest access
In de studio is plaats voor twee gasten. U beschikt er over een keuken, toilet, badkamer met douche, slaapkamer en lees- en televisiehoek.

host_about:
We're a couple in our thirties and just got the nicest son! Just before Edgar was born we lived in the apartment ourselves for three years. Now we live next door. We love travelling and now we started a family, we hope to enjoy the visits of other people exploring our beloved city: GENT
Whoever visits Ghent for the first time or even more, will hear us tell enthousistic about where to go to eat, to walk, to see and visit ...

name: Studio Stan, moderne studio centrum Gent
description:
Hello there and welcome to Studio Stan!

Brand new, bright and modern studio (40m2) in the heart of Ghent. The studio comes with a covered parking space, a kitchenette, has its own private bathroom with walk-in shower and a living/bedroom overlooking the private garden. The bedroom has a very comfortable queen size bed and a cozy sitting area. There is also a TV with Chromecast and fast Wi-Fi available. Shops, theaters, library, museums, restaurants and bars are all within walking distance.
neighborhood_overview: Rustige en vriendelijke buurt, woonerf dus autoluw
host_about: I'm a rather outgoing person who loves travelling. My perfect holiday would mean that I managed to meet up with locals and that I managed to experience their way of living. I love nothing more than to get to know and understand a different culture. I currently live back in Belgium but I have had the opportunity to live in Canada and Scotland.

name: TIPI Eco" Casita Loquita"  Natuur & Cultuur Gent
description:
Tipi Casita Loquita.
Elk zuchtje wind vertelt het verhaal van zijn reis...
Als je goed genoeg luistert, hoor je het fluisteren.
Dat is de zachte roep om avontuur die je de wildernis inlokt.
Deze authentieke Tipi ademt enkel liefde en warmte uit!
Het vuur in het midden zorgt voor een onvergetelijke nacht.
Het is een beleving waar Natuur & cultuur elkaar de hand schudden. Op 4 km het charmante Gent.
Puur natuur & toch alle comfort met winkels en zwembad & Welness op 2 km van je tipi! Welkom!

The space
Nomadic TIPI. from the states.
Exclusive romantic vacation! It's unique and the location is a perfect combination between Nature & City!
Living by nature
In the cold season we have a fire pit, wool blankets, rendeer, but always take extra warm clothes. See you soon!

Guest access
Tipi 100%+ graden! * Swimming pool
Bathroom inside the Villa. Toilet is inside or outside ECO- TOILET
neighborhood_overview: In the middle of nature and 5 min from the wood. Silence hood and comfort bakery with brunch. 7/7 Little supermarket in the street. Bus to the historic center Ghent , 5km. Tropical and Olympic swimming & Wellness pool in walking distance.
host_about:
We Are Travellers. How adventurous are you?
Collect moments, not things...
Travelling is like falling in love, you are less critical and only see the nice things...
Hi dear friends!! Welcome to Casita Loquita!!

name: Boatie's * Bed bad boot
description:
Aye!
Langs de oever van de Schelde stellen wij de master bedroom van onze woonboot te huur voor een verblijf van minstens 2 nachten. Je vertoeft op wandelafstand van het historische mooie Gent, rustig dobberend in een groene omgeving.
Je beschikt over een knusse kamer in de achterroef met een stijlvolle privé badkamer.
De zonsondergang op het dek staat tot je beschikking, al valt deze te delen met de kapitein en zijn matrozen.

The space
* inschepen langs de stuurhut
* dubbel bed in maritieme stijl
* fancy fiance badkamer met boottoilet, ligbad en douche
* heerlijk sunshine-happiness dek

Guest access
De boot ligt op 25 min wandelen van Gent Sint-Pieters alsook 20 min van Gent Zuid (bus/ tram).
Gent laat zich heerlijk fietsen. Te huur in Gent Sint-Pieters.
Kom je met de auto, dan kan je betalend parkeren in de omliggende straten. De boot ligt buiten de Lage Emissie Zone Gent.

Other things
neighborhood_overview:
De woonboot ligt op de groene Scheldearm tussen Gent-centrum & Merelbeke. Rustige ligging langs het wandel- en fietspad.
Voedingswinkels vind je dichtbij in Ledeberg; alsook de zondagse markt!

description:
Verne Dreaming is een fantastische keuze voor reizigers in Gent. Het biedt een romantische omgeving en veel nuttige voorzieningen voor tijdens je verblijf. Dompel je onder in de California rooftop loft.

Verne Dreaming is een Bed & Experience, het biedt tevens Tarot lezingen (www.tarotmerlot.be) en meditatie (www.qimono.be) op aanvraag aan.

name: Spacious room with sunny terrace, close to Ghent
description:
Charming room for two people close to the centre of Ghent. Alice, Karel and Snuggles (our cat) are happy to welcome you in Ghent!

The space
The room is on the first floor close to the (shared) bathroom and separate (shared) toilet.

You'l have a spacious double bed with a window on the south side that provides a lot of natural and cosy light.

The room has a desk with an extra computer screen which is ideal for a working holiday. There is unlimited wifi so you'll have no issues during a videocall or online meeting. Computer is not provided bring your own laptop.

Guest access
Our house is located in a quiet residential area, very close to every major highway (E17, E40 and R4) and public transport (Tram 2 to the centre, bus 9 to the train station).

The city centre is only 10 minutes away by tram and the Gentbrugse Meersen are at walking distance from the house (it is really a great nature reserve for walking
neighborhood_overview: Our house is very close to the old city centre of Ghent. You can take the tram or bus (5 minute) walk and hop on to the centre (10 minutes). We have shops, bakeries, butchers and some really great restaurants close by! The Gentbrugse Meersen, a greenbelt is just a few minutes walking. The train station of Gentbrugge is just 200 meters and will take you to the other cities in Belgium (Brussels:40 minutes, Bruges: 30 minutes, Antwerp: 1h,...)

name: Cozy retro house in Ghent, with tub and garden!
description:
Welcome!

My cozy, renovated house on the outskirts of Ghent is located in a quiet street in Ledeberg.
You will find all modern comforts: Wi-Fi, washing machine, fitted kitchen with SMEG gas stove, refrigerator. And all this in retro 50s style. (Pastel all the way!;))

Shops, the market square and the Keizerpark are within walking distance. The center & station Gent-Sint-Pieters can be reached in 5 minutes by public transport. As well as the entrance and exit of the highway (2min / car)

The space
It is a small but cozy house with only open spaces. Downstairs you have the kitchen and living room with a beautiful view on the garden. The large sliding windows provide pleasant light. There is a comfortable sofa with a flat screen TV, books are also available. Upstairs you have a spacious bright bedroom with a double bed, an authentic cast iron claw foot tub (!!), sink and a large sunny balcony. There is also an electric piano for the musical
neighborhood_overview: Everything is within walking distance. Bakers, butcher, supermarkets such as Delhaize (in the same street) and Colruyt (5min on foot). The market square is one street away, here every Sunday morning there is a market full of nice, local products! The bus and tram stops are also just around the corner. Within a 5-minute walk you have the Keizerpark, a popular and beautiful park along the water.

description:
De Leiecabin Yacht kan apart gehuurd worden om te overnachten en ligt in zijn thuishaven, de Leiecabin. Op een steenworp van het prachtige dorpje Deurle en Sint-Martens-latem!

het is een prachtige boot die aan de steiger ligt op elektriciteit. Er zijn 2 kamers aanwezig voor maximaal dus 4 personen. U heeft een prachtig zicht op de zonsondergang aan het achterdek.

In de prijs per nacht zit er standaard 2 uur varen met schipper (twv 330 EURO) Per extra vaaruur vragen wij 165 Euro

Other things to note
Deze boot is aangemeerd bij de Leiecabin, wel een aparte steiger maar hou er rekening mee dat u langs de Leiecabin passeert om op te stappen.
host_about: Leiecabin is a very nice Pipo Wagon with one room, bathroom and kitchenette. We are a stone drop away from Sint-Martens-Latem, one of the most pittoresque villages in East Flanders. The cabin has a sauna and hottub free to use! We also have an additional glamping tent for the kids to sleep or for a befriended couple!

name: Bright cozy apartment+private city garden+jacuzzi
description:
If you’re searching for a home that feels like home in beautiful Ghent, then this is the place to be!

The ground-floor apartment is a very bright, cosy, peaceful and stylish decorated open space with lots of natural light overlooking the peaceful 45 square meter garden with jacuzzi where you can relax and unwind.

I highly recommend this place for people working in the neighbourhood for a few weeks/months or families with young children who want to explore GHENT and the rest of Belgium.

The space
This fully furnished warm and cozy renovated apartment can host 3 adults +2 children. It has a comfortable sofa, digital smart tv, dining table and a very well-equipped kitchen. It is stocked with basics to get you started like spices, olive oil, coffee, tea,…
It also has 3 bedrooms, 1 master bedroom with kingsize bed and 2 smaller bedrooms with one single bed in one room and a kid’s bunk bed in the other room.
There’s one stylish bathroom
neighborhood_overview: Grocery shops, bakery, finger-licking restaurants and bars are footsteps away from the house.
host_about:
I'm Eva. A mother of an amazing boy and partner of a beautiful soul.
I’m a swim instructor and Group Fitness Trainer. I’m passionate about physical and mental health. On how to combine both and live a life in full awareness and gratitude .

name: 'tBegijnhof
description:
Other things to note
As you might have guessed, our name was derived from the Old Saint-Elisabeth Beguinage just around the corner. If history is your thing, you've come to the right place. Our neighbourhood is also known as the 'holy corner' where you can find no less than three different churches close by. The Saint-Elisabeth church hosts Anglican services, whilst an Orthodox and Protestant church are only 5 minutes walking distance. Can't get enough of history? Make sure to head to the city centre for a visit to the 'Gravensteen', Ghent's medieval castle, situated at the edge of the bustling city centre. Fine dining, take-out, good coffee or a quick bite, all that and more can be found at walking distance.

description:
You are most welcome in our cosy, newly renovated house.
Right in the historic city centre.

The house is located in a rustic and quiet street, within walking distance of restaurants, bars, tourist attractions, shops and train station.

Want to relax inhouse? You have the whole attic floor to yourself;
Huge queensize bed,
Luxurious private bathroom with shower and 2 sinks. please note: the private japanese toilet is downstairs.

Ask us if you want to do a paddle tour!

This newly renovated, spacious and cosy place welcomes up to 2 people.

Towels and toiletry included, so no need to bring your own shower

name: House in a quiet neighborhood and center of Ghent
description:
This House is 5 minutes by bike from the city center or 15 minutes walking distance. Everything is provided for a comfortable stay (wifi, TV, kitchen, bathroom). The bedroom is a kind of studio with its own lounge and dining table. But you can also use the regular TV room and kitchen. Everything is close by: a shop on the corner of the street and a park around the corner. From here you can just as well take a pleasant walk along the water and easily enter the city life. Welcome to Ghent!

The space
The studio/bedroom has a wardrobe with extra bed linen, coat hooks, towels and a hairdryer. There is coffee and tea provided in this studio + cutlery and plates. There is a table and a lounge. In my house there is a bathroom with toilet, a kitchen with gas stove, a storage room with washing machine and dryer and there is a small garden. There are two bikes available.

Guest access
There is nearby enough public transport, especially buses. You can p
neighborhood_overview: This house is located in a quiet area near the center. It is near the water and parks! So you can also take nice walks starting from the house along the water and so on towards a nature reserve. My neighborhood has a nice atmosphere with quiet pleasant people. There is also a neighborhood shop on the corner of my street and a bakery close by. Public transport is also no problem and is within walking distance of Gent-Dampoort Station.

The entrance and the stairs are the only spaces to share. All other rooms are private.

The apartment has a hall with possibility to leave coats, shoes or other stuff. On the right of this hall you find the living room with eating place and kitchen, the bathroom and a large terrace.
On the left of this hall you find the two sleeping rooms.

In the cozy living room you find the (smart)- television (you can link your

We live in a quiet and cozy neighborhood with some nice places to eat or drink. There is also a small supermarket 100 meters from our home.
Jump on your bike or take a little walk to the city centre. It is really nearby.

Hi, I am Sonja and I  have the opportunity to live with my two lovely sons and boy-friend in this beautiful house in Ghent. I am an art teacher in a teacher training school.

Free parking spot included + convertible VW Beetle on demand
Luxurious arrangements on demand

name: Perfect Studio for a short stay in Gent

host_about: I'm a mother to 2 boys. My husband, my boys and I all live on this address in Gent. We have recently started hosting here on Airbnb, with some success. We always try to make our guests feel completely at home. We hope you will enjoy your stay as much as our previous guests!

name: Guesthouse with natural vibe - bikes included
description:
Renovated in 2021 guest house/studio with separate entrance and large shared garden.
For 1 or 2 guests.
In a quiet green suburb of Ghent 4 km from the city center.
At 2 km from nature reserve Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen.
Beautiful cycling routes in the area.
We have 2 free bicycles available for you.
Supermarket, bakery, butcher, ... within walking/cycling distance.
Bus and tram stop less than 1 km away.

The space
The residence is an outbuilding next to our own house. The interior walls are finished with clay. This gives it a warm and natural look where you can completely relax. The room is equipped with wall heating that you can control yourself with a thermostat.
The window on the south side overlooks the large communal garden.
There is a kitchenette with oven/microwave, mini fridge. There are no hot plates, but there is a kettle.
A small bathroom with walk-in shower, sink and toilet and shower products.
1 double
neighborhood_overview:
Green environment.
From the green to the city center in twenty minutes by bike.
It is quiet, yet all amenities are easily accessible.
Supermarket, bakery, butcher within walking distance.
Every Sunday morning there is a food market nearby.
Tourist brochures are provided, as well as free Wifi so that you can plan your trips quietly and easily.
host_about: Ik en mijn man wonen met onze 2 dochters en 1 kat in Mariakerke, bij Gent en verhuren een gastenverblijf aan onze eigen woning. We hebben al meermaals via airbnb geboekt als reiziger en zijn trots nu zelf ook host te zijn. Welkom!

name: Gezellige privéloft in centrum Gent
description:
This beautiful accommodation is truly a wonderful location to stay at. Perfect to explore & enjoy the culture, history, energy & food of this amazing city but your good night sleep is also guaranteed!

Your own private and comfortable studio is on the 2 floor of our private home
The building is very centrally located: bus/tram stops nearby, several public car parks only minutes away, supermarket & groceries at less than 200 meters.

The space
This contemporary studio provides you with all the comfort you need: your own bathroom with shower, double bed, hairdryer, free WiFi, free city map and our own personal guide with all our favorite addresses. There is no kitchen but in the living area you have a microwave, fridge, and facilities for coffee and tea.
Just to be clear, the shower and the toilet are in the same space as the bedroom and living area but is separated by a curtain.
neighborhood_overview: Beautiful, quiet & characterful are only a few words to describe this open studio in the heart of the Historic Centre of Ghent, at a few minutes walking from city highlights like the "Castle of the Counts" (Gravensteen) and Ghent Belfry (Belfort) or to the countless shopping streets of the city.

name: Large modern house 10min from downtown Ghent/Gent
description:
Just 10 minutes from historic downtown Ghent. Our spacious modern house sleeps 6 people, features a large open seating area, kitchen and eating area. Garden with pond, terrace, outdoor table. Three bedrooms with the desired beds upon request. You are renting the complete house while we live abroad. Our house is just 10 minutes from historic downtown Ghent by car, tram (stop 500m) or bicycle. Free on street parking in front. Indoor (2) bicycle storage. We welcome children but no large pets.

The space
Living room: very spacious with 6 person couch. 77" TV with 7.1 Dolby Surround (no cable TV but Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and Disney+ available). View on garden, terrace and swimming pond (not heated). Living, kitchen and dining area are one big open space.

Kitchen: features a gas cooking plate, hot air oven, Nespresso Dolce Gusto, classic coffee machine, toaster, waterboiler, dishwasher.

Dining area: very large dining table seats 10 persons.

Tussen de bomen, weg van de wereld.
En tóch in Gent.

Voor de mensen die de stad genegen zijn, en wie de drukte soms wat te veel wordt. Voor wie graag dicht bij huis vertoeft, en intens contact wil maken met de natuur. Voor zij die doorgaans van hot naar her hollen en eens even stil willen staan.

name: Le Petit Bordeleau
description:
Enjoy a stay on board of a 1952 barge with astonishing views on the old docks of Ghent. Everything you need for a romantic waterside getaway on walking distance from the city centre.

The space
The former barge is converted into 2 luxury studios and one loft. All 3 have their own private entrance and are fully equipped. Le petit bordeleau is one of the studios in a trendy loft style.
If necessary, This studio can be connected with the big loft. Together they can be used by 4 persons, with 2 bed and bathrooms

Guest access
Tea, Nespresso and water included. Use of bikes possible on demand.
neighborhood_overview: The area used to be a busy harbour site. Nowadays, most warehouses and remains of the harbour industry are converted into living and working spaces. The former harbour site is now the biggest protected city view of Ghent and is becoming an important tourist spot.
host_about:
Hello,
As I am a 'globe trotter', I allways like to meet new people and experience new  cultures. Gastronomy and design are my key words. If you want to share the same passions like I have? Just come and stay in my luxury 19th century loft!

The room has a view over a park, with big windows so lots of sunlight.

The neighbourhood is surprisingly quiet considering it is located in the historical center of Ghent, almost everything is in walking distance, restaurant, museum, bars, shops.

I would consider this airbnb for young people/couples, the stairs are a bit tight. if you're not used to to rent a room in a shared house then this will not be for you.

Due to covid i will try to make this contact free as possible -> self check-in.
host_about:
Easy going

I am originally from Ghent, grew up here, went abroad for a couple of years and now I'm back.

name: Modern ruim appartement direct aan station Gent SP
description:
Vanuit ons centraal gelegen appartement ligt het gezellige levendige Gent binnen handbereik. De ligging nét aan Station Gent-Sint-Pieters maakt dat u beschikt over verbindingen met trein, tram, bus en taxi, nét voor de deur (1 min). De gezellige en veilige buurt biedt een 7/7 supermarkt, winkels, bars, restaurants, nachtwinkel (allen op 1 min) en een groen stadspark met speeltuin in de onmiddelijke omgeving. De straat is verkeersarm en dus opvallend rustig. Het appartement biedt alle comfort.

The space
Ons ruim en modern appartement heeft een ruime afgescheiden slaapkamer met dubbel bed en met sofa, smart TV en dressingkast. In de hal met vestiaire treft u tevens een apart toilet aan. De badkamer heeft een ligbad, douche en 2 lavabo's. De volledig uitgeruste keuken beschikt over een fornuis (4 kookplaten), een frigo met vriesvak, koffiezet, servies, basisprodukten, glazen en bestek. De eethoek biedt plaats aan 4 personen. De ruime mezzanine (verdiep hoger) heeft
neighborhood_overview: Ons gezellig appartement is werkelijk ideaal gelegen net aan het Station Gent-Sint-Pieters. De transport-connecties zijn ronduit excellent. De stationsbuurt is een mooie, nette en veilige buurt. De buurt telt heel wat prima bars en restaurants. Ook de supermarkten en nachtwinkels in de straat van de accomodatie zijn allen van een prima kwaliteit. Het historische Citadelpark ligt op 5 min stappen. Een korte wandeling (10 min) brengt je in het groene recreatiedomein 'De Blaarmeersen' (zandstrand, speeltuinen, horeca en sport).

This historical monument is treated with the necessary respect and restored by Rietveldprojects.be.
It as converted in 2020 into 3 apartments and 1 bakery on the ground floor. Each apartment is available only 4 months of the year and is used by the owners for the remaining 8 months. The apartments were carefully restored and furnished with top design pieces. Super central location, from each apartment you have a view on the historical buildings such as the Gerard de Duivelsteen of the 13theC.

name: Lichtrijke slaapkamer met badkamer
description:
Welkom in onze rijwoning in de stadswijk Ledeberg, aan de rand van het centrum van Gent.

Van hieruit kan je de historische stad Gent ontdekken met tram, bus, fiets of te voet.

Wie bieden je een twee persoons slaapkamer met eigen badkamer op de tweede verdieping van de woning aan.

The space
Een privé slaapkamer met tweepersoonsbed vol natuurlijk licht en recent gerenoveerd.

Een eigen badkamer (aansluitend in de ruimte) is voorzien, alsook kan de kamer gekoeld worden via airco indien nodig.

Verder kan je gebruik maken van wifi, een Nespresso koffiemachine en een mini koelkast.

Het gastentoilet ligt op de eerste verdieping. De kamer zelf is op de tweede verdieping, hou dus wel rekening met de trap.

De andere kamers van de woning zoals keuken, leefruimte en terras kan je ook gebruiken, maar zijn wel gedeeld met onszelf.

Other things to note
De toeristen belasting van Stad
neighborhood_overview:
Onze woning ligt in een rustige straat in Ledeberg, een stadswijk aan de rand van het centrum van Gent.

Vlakbij vind je een supermarkt, frituur, bakker en beenhouwer. Ook enkele kleine cafeetjes en eetplekjes. Op zondag is er elke week een grote markt op Ledebergplein.

De leukste en mooiste plekjes en adresjes, die vind je natuurlijk in het historisch centrum van Gent.

Met de bus- of tramhalte op 2 minuten wandelen ben je een boogscheut verwijderd van het hart van de Stad Gent.

Met de fiets een tiental minuten, te voet een twintigtal minuten.

Geniet van de Arteveldestad in al zijn aspecten. Een terrasje in onze autoluwe stad, een mooie wandeling langs de historische gebouwen, een fietsritje langs de Leie, een bezoek aan het Lam Gods in de Sint-Baafskathedraal, een rondleiding in het Stedelijk Museum voor Actuele Kunst (SMAK). Hier kan je het allemaal beleven in de meest gezellige stad van Vlaanderen.

name: Renovated Apartment in Ancient Town House
description:
Free parking is provided!

The apartment is on the second floor of a century old renovated Town House. It has high ceilings, a comfy saloon, full-equiped kitchen and a private bathroom.

The apartment is situated in the Portus Ganda Area, near the Dampoort Railway Station. No need to take any public transport from our house for your city visits, it’s in walking distance to the historic center:

Escape the world for a moment in this peaceful, centrally located accommodation.

The space
Warm, bright and cosy south oriented house. The kitchen and dining area are located on the ground floor, as well as the toilet in the hallway. On the atmospheric first floor, there's a relaxing sofa and equipment to watch a movie on the big screen :-) The living room is connected to a little balcony, on which you can enjoy the last rays of sunshine. name: Typical townhouse in Ghent
description:
Looking for a typical and cosy stay in Ghent?

This tiny house is a 19th Century accommodation located in one of the oldest "cité" (pedestrian area) of Ghent.

You are at walking distance from the city center (15 min) in a lively neighbourhood where you find shops, cafes and other amenities as well as the biggest natural park of the region.

The space
The house has a bedroom, a bathroom, an open living space with kitchen. The living space includes a sofabed.
Outside there is a nice open-air court, shared with 3 other similar houses that can be used for outdoor barbecues during summer or campfires during winter.

Guest access
The city center is at walking distance (15 min), reachable by bike (a nice ride next to the river) or by public transport (for example bus 3 is just across the street).

The main train station, Gent-sint-pieters, is reachable by Tram 4 (15 min) which stops 300 meters from the house.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the "brugsepoort" neighbourhood, located in the north-west of Ghent. This area is very lively, thanks to the presence of various commercial activities as shops, bakeries, supermarkets, restaurants and cafes.

We can give several advises to the curious guests!
host_about: I'm a young Belgian designer who loves tiny living and minimalism.

name: Lichtrijk huis in rustige kindvriendelijke wijk

Rustige uitvalsbasis voor een bezoek aan het historisch centrum van Gent op slechts 3,4km.

Onze nieuwbouwwoning ligt in een autoluwe woonwijk rond een park. Er is geen doorgaand verkeer. Ideaal voor een picknick of voor kinderen om op de straat te spelen, fietsen, steppen,..

Gratis koffie, thee, water en parking.

The space
Het gelijkvloers is een open lichtrijke ruimte met daarin de keuken, eethoek, living en trap.
Aan de achterzijde is een privétuin met houten terras. Aan de voorzijde is het zalig aperitieven in de avondzon.
Het eerste verdiep heeft 2 slaapkamers. Één met een queensize tweepersoonsbed en de andere met n ergonomische matras op een lattenbodem en op de grond en een peuterbed.

Guest access
2 grote gratis parkings op 50m van de woonst.
350m bus naar het historisch centrum
2,3 km van treinstation Gent Dampoort

In het park zijn verschillende speelmogelijkheden zoals een wilgenhut, klimboom en basketbalgoal. De meeste bewoners van de straat zijn gezinnen met kinderen van piepjong tot tieners. name: Villa in prime location, combine city & nature
description:
What used to be an old castle farm has been transformed into a large villa, home to Fien and Wouter. They offer you a full floor with 3 rooms each with a private bathroom. Villa Parkbos is beautifully tucked away in the leafy outskirts of Ghent. Enjoy a book in the garden or relax room. Up for more excitement? Explore the vibrant city of Ghent or the picturesque town of Sint-Martens-Latem. Ask us about guided bike, walk and boat tours. We’ll share all our favorite gems in the neighborhood.

The space
Access through a private drive with parking, a spacious 1.8ha garden with pond and tennis court, rooms with king size bed, Netflix and WiFi, kitchenette, luxurious bathrooms.

Other things to note
Find us on social media via @Villa Parkbos
host_about: Villa Parkbos is een plek waar geschiedenis, kunst en natuur samenkomen. Wat vroeger een oude kasteelhoeve was, is omgetoverd tot een luxueuze villa, de thuisbasis van Fien en Wouter. Verken de nabijgelegen bruisende stad Gent of het pittoreske dorpje Sint-Martens-Latem. Ontdek het op eigen houtje, of vraag ons naar begeleide fiets-, wandel- en boottochten. We delen al onze favoriete pareltjes in de buurt.

name: Cosy Sous-Sol near the city center
description:
Come and relax in our cosy sous-sol on the little island at the edge of Ghent, the former service quarters of our house from 1912. With great care for the authentic elements, we have transformed this into a nice space with an eye for design. The space has a private access to our garden, where you can enjoy the green surroundings. It is located near the park at the old docks, and a stone's throw from the center.

The space
The space consists of a connecting living area and bedroom, a veranda with dining table, adjacent to the well-equipped kitchen (oven, stove, dishwasher) and the walk-in shower. The veranda gives access to the garden.

Please note that the bedroom and living area are only 2m high, so less suitable for people taller than 1m90.

Guest access
It is possible to get the keys out of the lockbox yourself, if desired we will of course be happy to receive you in person (we live above the studio). Parking is available in the
neighborhood_overview: Our sous-sol is located on the island 'de Muide', the former port area of Ghent. You can still find numerous references to the old glory days in the neighborhood, warehouses, cranes, etc. Nearby a park has been laid out with a small beach overlooking the old docks. The city center is a fifteen minute walk, or just take the tram 200m from our door.

The space
The former barge is converted into 2 luxury studios and one big loft. All three have their own private entrance and are fully equipped. Le grand bordeleau is the trendy loft. name: Room w/ private bathroom - near train station
description:
Enjoy a beautiful, cozy room with a spacious private bathroom located on the top floor of our home - a recently renovated 1960s house in a calm street. Our home is located near the Sint-Pieters train station and is at walking distance of the city center.

The space
The bedroom consists of a double bed (180 x 200 cm), a bench, a clothing rack, a Nespresso machine and a TV with Netflix (not seen on the pictures as it was added afterwards).
The bathroom is accessible via the hall and consists of a shower, a sink and a toilet.
Both rooms are located on the 3rd floor of our house. You will have to use the main entrance and main hall and stairs for access.
The hall and stairs are the only places that will be shared with us. On your floor, you have complete privacy.

Other things to note
Please mind that we have an adorable cat named Billie. If you aren't fond of her, you can of course keep the door to both the bedroom and bathroom
neighborhood_overview:
The main train station 'Gent Sint-Pieters' is at 8 minutes walking distance. From there, you can easily take public transport to all parts of town.
From our house, the city center is located at approximately 20 minutes by foot or 8 minutes by tram (using the tram line 2, which stops at 2 minutes from the house).

host_about:
We are Edward and Daphné, while traveling for our job we got to know airbnb. We love the concept and always have stayed in lovely places and met friendly people.
In the villa of my grandfather we started our adventure by renting out some beds, now we have 2 great locations. One is for big groups up to 32 persons just 5km of the center of Ghent and the other location are studio's in de center of Ghent. We love to share on airbnb. We love to meet new people and are sure you will love your stay with us.
We are an easygoing young couple and can give you lot's of information about the region, especially Ghent. 
We are working in our own company "ed", a baby and interior design studio. Our life motto is "every accomplishment starts with a dream"

name: Cosy private garden house in the heart of Ghent
description:
This lovely holiday house is located in the back garden of a remarkable four story apartment building by the hand of architects Vens Vanbelle. Although it is located in the city centre at 100m from the Gravensteen castle, it is surprisingly quiet and perfect for relaxing and enjoying a good night's sleep during your visit to the vibrant city of Ghent. The wide range of gastronomic delights, trendy shops and cultural highlights are at stone's throw. Welcome to Ghent!

The space
The garden house of 58 m2 has two stories. On the ground floor are the living area and equipped kitchen with dining space. The somewhat steep staircase takes you to the bedroom with kingsize bed and separate bathroom with shower. There are no direct neighbours, so a quiet night is ensured. Feel free to use the garden, it is stunning in spring time.

Guest access
We are very well located for visitors arriving by public transport. The tram stop is around the corner at 10
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the quiet and safe neighbourhood called 'Prinsenhof' with picturesque streets and the river Lieve running through it. Very nearby are the Gravensteen castle, the Design museum, the Graslei and Korenmarkt. You might say it is a quiet oasis in the bustling city centre.
host_about:
Hi!
We are Mechiel and Heleen, a couple since many years living in the very centre of Ghent together with our all time favourite cat Fons. We enjoy delicious drinks and finger licking food, a night in or out with friends, an occasional run, hiking trips and tunes from around the globe. 
Like many others, we also love to travel, basically anywhere. Up to now we have mostly enjoyed the hospitality of others during our travels. But, a while ago an opportunity presented itself for us to open up our own holiday place and we just grabbed it. We are super excited to present our backyard holiday home and to welcome all kinds of people regardless of colour, gender, sexual orientation or religion, to come and stay over while exploring our lovely city. 
We have lived and worked in Ghent for many, many years, know where to find hidden gems and so have quite some tips & tricks for visitors. 
We hope to welcome you soon and help make your visit to Ghent unforgettable!

name: Trendy Apartment to Discover Belgium
description:
This clean and trendy apartment 2 bedroom apartment with terrace is perfect for leisure or for business stays if you need to be in or around Belgium. It is equipped with all the necessary amenities for you to enjoy (either short stay or medium stay). It has easy access to al nearby highways, a tram line that runs straight to the city centre of Ghent and this while being in a quiet neighbourhood. The apartment is also located close to a supermarket and there is free parking on the premises.

The space
The apartment is newly decorated and equipped with all the necessary amenities. It is equipped with floor heating thats always cosy and comfortable during those chilly winter nights.

Guest access
the whole apartment is for the guests
neighborhood_overview: Its located in the suburbs of Ghent with easy access to every highway that lead you to Brussels (40 min), Antwerp (40 min), Bruges (30 min), Courtrai (30 min)  and Ypres (40 min). The tram line that stops near the apartment brings you to the city centre in 20min or if you go by bike it takes you 15-20 min. Ghent EXPO is 5-10min drive and the technology park in Ghent is practically walking distance.
host_about:
Ghent is an awesome European City to visit, there is always something to do and to visit. Thats why I  would love to share my apartment with people who want to explore a medieval city with a touch of trendy.
I am self-employed at this moment and an everlasting student of knowledge and I hope we can meet during one of your stays.

name: BnB Renee - trendy apartment near station
description:
Recently renovated modern 2 bedroom apartment very close to trainstation Gent Sint-Pieters, city center, several musea (SMAK, STAM, MSK), nature park (citadelpark), delicious breakfast place, several restaurants, butcher, bakery, farmacist, small supermarkets,..
You will enjoy the location, neighbourhood and athmosphere of the (babyfriendly) apartment.
Please don't hesitate to contact me when you have any question or special request.

The space
The apartment is very spacious. The wooden floor gives a warm athmosphere.

Sun, light, warmth, modern furniture, a practical kitchen and bathroom with good equipment to prepare some breakfast, lunch or dinner (also salt, pepper, oil, sugar available).

Two bedrooms you can only dream of with comfortable desk-office. Good basis to work here for some days during conference or courses.

available: Towels, sheets, toiletpaper, free wifi, TV and digicorder.

I like to discover and try new things. My passion is meeting people. 
My device: do whatever makes you happy!

name: Modern & warm apartment on main floor
description:
This beautiful, conveniently furnished private apartment is located 2 km from Sint Pieters station, in a green area, close to the park.

There is a tramstop nearby and possibility to rent 2 adult bicycles.

You have a good connection with the highways, as well as with Ghent-Centre.
So you can go in all directions.

The space consists of a hallway, bathroom with shower, kitchen and living-/bedroom.

Wifi is excellent and there is the possibility to switch on your Netflix account on the TV.

The space
In the living room there are 2 fold-out bunk beds. You can also convert the seat into a comfortable sofa bed.

Comfort is very important to us and we have paid a lot of attention to this.

The entire space was newly built in 2021 and is of very high quality.

The entire apartment is about 45m2 in size.

You will receive fresh sheets and towels and if you would like to see them refreshe
neighborhood_overview:
It is an exceptionally quiet neighborhood with lots of greenery in the area.

There is a basketball court, football field and less than 500m steps.
In addition, there are many beautiful walking routes in the area, as well as good connections with public transport such as bus, tram and train. But also the highways.

The ideal location to relax, to enjoy nature and the city.

It is possible to rent a bicycle and by bike you are about 30 minutes away from Ghent-Centre, by car this is 15 minutes.

name: Sfeervolle woonwagen in  stadstuin met zwemvijver
description:
Onze ruime woonwagen is een plaats van schoonheid en rust vlak bij het historische centrum van Gent. Perfect voor Glamping: prachtig ingericht met oog voor detail, alle basisvoorzieningen en een tikkeltje glamour. Je hebt het huisje op wielen helemaal voor jezelf. Het ligt verscholen tussen het groen achterin een sfeervolle stadstuin. Er is een klein terras. De zwemvijver en vuurplaats zijn niet privé, maar kunnen gebruikt worden op voorwaarde dat de rust rond het huis bewaard blijft.

The space
Als je houdt van gezelligheid, sfeer met een beetje bohémien zal je betoverd worden door deze bijzondere woonwagen. Verwacht je niet de luxe van een chique hotel en niet de stilte van een afgelegen bos, maar een unieke eigenzinnige plek in een rustige groene omgeving vlak bij een bruisende stad, dan ben je helemaal op de juiste plaats.

Guest access
Parkeren kan gratis naast het terrein.
Je kan met de trein aankomen in het station van Gentbrugge
neighborhood_overview: Gentbrugge is een levendige, relatief groene deelgemeente van Gent. De wijk ligt op een boogscheut van het historische centrum maar grenst ook aan het natuurgebied de Gentbrugse Meersen. Er zijn winkels, restaurants, cafeetjes op wandelafstand. Treinstation, tram en bus zijn vlakbij.

Welcome to Studio Kalvermarkt. A cozy and peaceful hangout spot on the top floor of our home. You have you're own floor in the house with a beautiful room and bathroom.

Sofie, Arne & Sesam the Labradoodle

name: Huize Rozina, charming cottage in the Lys region
description:
In the middle of the Latem lakes and close to the Lys you will stay in an original, restored Flemish farmhouse where time stood still. You and your group have the entire house at your disposal. Rest, nature, gastronomy and culture are what you will find here. On the other hand, this is also the ideal base for exploring Sint-Martens-Latem, Ghent and the surrounding area, and for enjoying the peace and quiet in the evening.

The space
All rooms are tastefully decorated and equipped with all comforts to make your stay as pleasant as possible. You will notice that you will not lack for anything during your stay.

Guest access
At Rozina House there is a parking space for one vehicle. Other vehicles can park for free at the end of the street (200m away). There is a bus stop at the beginning of the street. The bus that goes in the direction of Ghent stops here. There is also a stop for the on-call bus in the street.
neighborhood_overview: Rural location with lots of greenery. Enjoy nature, the river Lys, good food and art ... Located at 200 m from a dead-end street, so not so much traffic. The ideal place for beautiful walks, cycling trips ... or to dream away along the banks of the Lys.

name: Something Els, guestroom in the centre of the city
description:
Enjoy an extraordinary visit to our city of Ghent and stay in this spacious and cosy room. The room is situated at the second floor of a stilish old house. The medieval street is very quiet, with nearly no trafic. The bathroom is directly connected to the room. You can find coffee and tea in the room. An ideal spot to come to rest after an exciting day of city experience

The space
The room is 5 to 5 metres big. There is a coach, and table to eat at. Bed linen and bath linen is provided. On demand there is also a babybed and child's chair at your disposal, suitable for children up to 2 years.

Guest access
The house is on walking distance from the tram stop. There is a public parking place nearby. You can also park your car at the border of the city and come to the centre by shuttle.

Other things to note
You can enter the house independently. The key is for your disposition in a key box. Take care of the other hosts i
host_about:
Hallo, 
Ik woon in het centrum van Gent en vind het een plezier om mijn mooie burgerswoning te delen met tijdelijke bezoekers aan onze stad.  Ik woon zelf met mijn 2 jongvolwassen kinderen op het gelijkvloers en de eerste verdieping.  Op de tweede en de zolderverdieping hebben we een vakantieruimte ingericht.  Het is een mooi en ruim appartement voor 2 personen,  of voor een gezin met maximum 2 jonge kinderen.  We genieten van het internationale bezoek in ons huis.  Bezoekers geven zelf aan of ze zin hebben in een praatje.  We respecteren de privacy en je kan op eigen houtje de woning betreden en je weg vinden in het appartement.

name: Masterbedroom in monumentale Interbellum-Villa
description:
Uit deze charmante, unieke accommodatie wil je nooit meer weg. In een beschermde art-deco woning ligt deze kamer met private badkamer. Een uitstraling van weleer in combinatie te midden van rust, natuur EN stad. Als onderdeel van het bedrijvencentrum UR.zone kan je genieten van de extra faciliteiten : centrale keuken, authentiek salon, buitenzwembad (zomer), tuin. Voel je welkom ! Je kan aansluitend een werkplek, vergaderzaal of coachruimte huren in de co-working. (ontbijt apart bestellen)

The space
Dit is de master bedroom in een directeurswoning. Ze kijkt uit op de riante tuin met (onverwarmd) zwembad. De kamer is uitgerust dubbel bed, tafel met stoelen, kasten, open haard (indien gewenst / apart aan te vragen). De badkamer (2 wastafels, bidet en bad) is vernieuwd en kijkt met een groot raam uit op de slaapkamer. Het toilet is nog old style. Er is mogelijkheid om een gemeenschappelijke douche te gebruiken (gedeeld met 2 andere éénpersoonsstudio's).

name: Charmant herenhuis voor kattenliefhebbers
description:
Beautiful townhouse in the center of Ghent with a super cozy, green city garden. Stylishly decorated. Near the water, in the beautiful neighborhood 'De Visserij'. Easily accessible by public transport (bus stop in front of the door), near Ghent Dampoort station.

The townhouse has three bedrooms (each with its own bathroom and toilet).

You'll share the garden of our beautiful house with our three cats. They are very cute and used to people, they won't bother you at all!

The space
Complete house, available for 6 people.

On the ground floor you can find a big hallway, a toilet and access to the kitchen and the living room. The big glass door in the kitchen gives access to the garden. We have great internet (Telenet wifi!) and Netflix on the television. We have a cozy stove (you can find wood in the garden shed).

On the first floor there is a laundry room, a bathroom (bad, toilet, shower) and a bedroom (for 2).

name: Karaktervol huis met grote tuin aan de stadsrand
description:
Dit huis uit 1935 met grote tuin is perfect om tot rust te komen én een perfecte uitvalbasis om het stadscentrum te bezoeken!

Er is openbaar vervoer dat u in minder dan een halfuur naar het centrumbrengt!

The space
De benedenverdieping bestaat uit een leefruimte met keuken, een salon én een werkplek. In de leefruimte staat een grote antieke, eiken tafel. De keuken heeft alle nodige faciliteiten (kookvuur, frigo, diepvries, koffie-apparaat, etc.) In het salon vindt u een 2 éénzit-zetels en een chaise longue. In de werkplek vindt u een bureau en ligzetel.

Op de 1ste verdieping vindt u de slaapkamer met een groot bed (180cmx200cm). Naast de slaapkamer is er een badkamer met ligbad/douche en een toilet.

Op de 2de verdieping (zolderkamer) is er een heel grote salonzetel waar u de mogelijkheid hebt om naar films te kijken via een projector. In die ruimte kunt u ook gebruik maken van de yoga-mat en gewichtjes of een boek nemen uit
neighborhood_overview: Het huis is gelegen in een woonbuurt in de deelgemeente Zwijnaarde.  Op 10 minuten wandelen vindt u het karaktervolle gemeenteplein mét kiosk en  een gezellige bruine kroeg.

name: Boho Charming Studio (2p) in central Ghent
description:
Ga er gewoon even tussenuit in deze net gerenoveerde stijlvolle studio, centraal gelegen in het mooiste stukje van Gent, Patershol.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Just enjoy and relax this newly renovated and stylisch studio, centrally located in the most beautiful area of Ghent, Patershol.

The space
Deze charmante studio is authentiek omwille van zijn locatie in de Middeleeuwse wijk, Patershol. De studio ligt in hartje Gent maar toch in een oase van rust. De studio bevindt zich op het gelijkvloers van het pand en kijkt uit op een gedeeld charmant middenpleintje. Het interieur van de studio is welbedacht gekozen met aandacht voor duurzame en stijlvolle materialen. De studio voorziet in alle faciliteiten die comfort bieden (springbox bed, comfortabele sofa, wifi, Smart tv, keuken met vaatwas, combi oven, inductie kookplaat, etc..)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
neighborhood_overview:
Deze studio ligt in hartje Patershol. De oudste en mooiste wijk van Gent Centrum. In een wir war van kleine middeleeuwse straatjes, en op wandelafstand van het kasteel Gravensteen vind je deze studio.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
This studio is located in the heart of Patershol. The oldest and most beautiful district of Ghent. This studio is located in a maze of small medieval streets and within walking distance of the Gravensteen castle.
host_about: Hi there! We are a couple in the early 30's with two little kids. We are  crazy of cats, adore city tripping, enjoy good food and a nice beer, but most of al: INTERIOR-lovers! Our roots lay in Bruges, we studied in Antwerp, but Ghent touched our soul! So we decided to create our home here! Trough the years we traveled a lot and saw a lot of fantastic places. Raised by parents who have their own B&B learned us how interesting it is to meet people from around the world. It inspired us to do what we love the most: creating nice places and hosting people who want to discover the city as a real local. We create places how we would want it to be as guests. Interior, design and coziness was our hobby but became our passion, and eventually our goal in life. By hosting people in our accomodations we can combine our passions in photography, interior, design and meeting new people all over the world.

name: Cozy House in an Art Village, Close to Ghent!
description:
Villa-Do is een charmante en gezellige villa, gelegen in het pittoreske kunstdorp Sint-Martens Latem en omgeven door de bruisende natuur van de Latemse Meersen en de kronkelende Leie.

name: Bed+Bike Green roof top loft in Gent
description:
This bright roof top apartment is located in a quiet green neighbourhood in the vibrant city of Ghent. Close to the city centre (2,5 km) and Gent Dampoort train station (1,7 km) with direct connections to Brussels (Airport), Bruges, Antwerp, ... The apartment has a sunny terrace, cosy living room, bedroom with double bed, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. Public transport, bakery, shops and parc around the corner (50m). There are 2 folding bikes available (use at own responsibility).

The space
The roof top loft is located on the top floor (2nd) from the building. The ground floor and first floor locate an atelier and office.
You have the loft apartment completely for yourself (living area, bathroom, kitchen, bedroom, terrace).
The shared spaces are the front door, hall way and bicycle shed.
There is no elevator in the building.
The apartment loft measures about 56 square meter.

Guest access
Car: free parking in the
neighborhood_overview:
Residential neighbourhood with a wonderful nice park across the street. One side of the park is great for walks, picnicking, because it’s landscaped more ‘naturally’ (make sure to wear mud proof boots in rainy weather) with a small pont. The other side of the parc locates plenty outdoor play/sport facilities and a subtropical indoor/outdoor swim paradise.
It’s a quiet neighbourhood on a stone’s throw from the city center (2,5 km). There is a bakery and multiple supermarkets in 5’ walking distance. Our neighbourhood also locates some great local addresses for coffee, lunch, dinner, drinks,… we’re happy to share them with you!

name: Historical mansion appartement in city centre
description:
Sleep in the heart of the city of Ghent, with extraordinary view on the old courthouse and opera.

Spacious appartment in a historic mansion, 25 meters from the main square (Kouter), the main shopping street, groceries, breakfast spots, restaurants...
1 bedroom with king size bed and spacious and cosy living room with great views on the old courthouse; bathroom with bathtub; fully equipped kitchen with advanced coffee machine and free coffee,..

The space
Our appartement is located in a building with a lot of history, sleeping with views on the old courthouse in the middle of Ghent!
neighborhood_overview:
Our appartment is located in the heart of the city center, all you want to visit is within walking distance. The famous square Kouter is just around the corner (30m) and has a very lovely sunday flower market. When you follow the main shopping street (Veldstraat), which is only 20m away from the door you arrive at the Korenmarkt (3min walk) with its famous three towers.

Everything you need is closeby and within parking distance: breakfast places, restaurants, grocery shops..

There is a tram stop at 30 meters which takes you directly to the central train station (Ghent Sint Pieters) or a large parking area (P+R The Loop/Expo) where you can leave your car for free
host_about:
In love with our beautifull city Ghent, my boyfriend Pieter and his two beautifull daughters Kat en Lilou ;-) 

We live togheter part-time in the Visserij region Ghent when the kids are around, but I also still have my own appartment in the city centre. As this place is only used part-time we have the option to rent it to you guys when visiting the city!

B&B Schopenhauer is situated in the picturesque historical centre of Ghent and consists of two beautiful suites with both a different atmosphere.

The Athma Room - Time to relax, beautiful room with private hammam. This room has a little private garden with seating area and outside shower.

The Schopenhauer is 600 metres from St Bavo’s Cathedral and 1.2 km from St Peter’s Square and Abbey. It is 2.8 km from the bed and breakfast to Ghent St Peter’s Train Station. From here, you can travel to Bruges (35 minutes) and Brussels (45 minutes).

name: Zeer lichtrijke studio met alle comfort
description:
Kom logeren en genieten in onze zeer lichtrijke loft/studio met alle comfort!

The space
De studio werd volledig eigenhandig gebouwd en werd twee jaar gebruikt als hoofdverblijfplaats tijdens de verbouwingen van de rest van het huis. Alles werd volledig vernieuwd in 2019 en voorzien van alle comfort.
oppervlakte: 55m²

Als je binnenkomt in de studio, kom je direct in de leefruimte met aansluitend de open keuken met eiland en barkrukjes. De keuken is volledig ingericht en voorzien van koelkast, vaatwas, microgolfoven, kookplaat, dampkap, oven, koffiemachine en talrijk keukengerei.

Aan de keuken bevindt zich de deur naar de badkamer. Die is voorzien met regendouche & ligbad. Zo kan je kiezen tussen een snelle opfrisser of een stomend relaxmomentje. Uiteraard is een toilet ook aanwezig.

Vanuit de leefruimte is een trapje naar de mezzanine waar een dubbel bed (180x200cm) staat. Je waant je in een gezellige tent onder het puntdak.<
neighborhood_overview:
Ons rijhuis bevindt zich op de ideale locatie tussen stad en natuur.
Gentbrugge is een rustige stadswijk die pal aan het centrum van Gent geplakt is.

Er zijn verschillende mogelijkheden om comfortabel en snel in het stadscentrum te geraken (zie hieronder bij vervoersmogelijkheden).

Er zijn verschillende verzorgde parken in de buurt met speeltuin en openbare BBQ- plaatsen: Arbedpark (3 min. wandelen: 300m), Keizerpark (11 min wandelen: 1km) , Victoria regiapark (6 min wandelen: 500m).

Padelclub Padel4U2 op 750m.

Natuurpark "Gentbrugse meersen" op 10 minuten wandelen. Daar kan je bewegwijzerde wandelingen maken.

Ook met de fiets kan je starten vanaf knooppunt 5 en is het heerlijk fietsen langs de schelde.

Winkels;
- bakkerij op 600m
- slagerij op 450m
- (grote) Carrefour market op 400m
- Frituur op 300m
- verschillende restaurants/ bistro's in de buurt
